title: Most Popular Variations of Blackjack in Online Casinos
body: Why Trying New Variations of Blackjack Online Is Worth Your Time Blackjack Variations = New Ways to Win! If you‚Äôve ever sat down at a blackjack table, you know why people love this game. It‚Äôs fast, simple, and it gives you the feeling that you can outsmart the house. But here‚Äôs the thing: a lot of players don‚Äôt realize: the version of blackjack most of us grew up playing is just one of many. These days, online casinos are packed with variations of blackjack, each with its own rules and personality. Some add a little more suspense. Others give you better odds or extra bets to keep things interesting. And once you‚Äôve tried a few, you‚Äôll see why players keep coming back to test them all. If you‚Äôre curious where to start, the Slots Paradise blackjack online casino makes it easy to explore all sorts of different blackjack games without any pressure. Here‚Äôs a closer look at the most popular types of blackjack you‚Äôll find online, and what makes each one special. European Blackjack ‚Äî Same Game, More Suspense European blackjack appears almost identical to the classic game at first glance. But the twist is that the dealer doesn‚Äôt check for blackjack right away. Instead, you play your whole hand before they flip their cards. It‚Äôs a small difference, but it really changes how each decision feels. You‚Äôre left guessing just a little longer, which some players enjoy. Blackjack Switch ‚Äî A Clever Option for Thinkers If you like feeling in control, give Blackjack Switch a shot. In this version, you play two hands at once, and you‚Äôre allowed to swap your second card between them. That one little option can turn a losing hand into a winner, if you know how to use it. There aren‚Äôt secrets to winning blackjack, but a game like Switch does give you more ways to play smart, which is about as close to a ‚Äúsecret‚Äù as it gets. Spanish 21 ‚Äî The Friendliest Version Around Among all the blackjack variants available online, Spanish 21 is arguably the most forgiving. Yes, they take all the 10s out of the deck (which sounds bad at first), but then they throw in a bunch of player-friendly rules to make up for it. You can double after splitting, surrender late, and get bonus payouts for certain hands. If you‚Äôve had a rough streak at the regular tables, Spanish 21 is a nice change of pace. Perfect Pairs ‚Äî A Fun Side Bet Perfect Pairs is a simple but fun twist on regular blackjack. You make a side bet on whether your first two cards will match. The closer they match ‚Äî same suit, same color ‚Äî the bigger your payout. It doesn‚Äôt really change how you play, but it gives every hand a little extra excitement right from the start. Pontoon ‚Äî A Quirky Favorite from Across the Pond Pontoon is like blackjack‚Äôs British cousin. The basics are the same: try to get to 21 without busting, but the terminology is different and the rules have a few fun twists. For example, you ‚Äútwist‚Äù instead of hit and ‚Äústick‚Äù instead of stand. Plus, there are bonuses for pulling off certain hands, like five cards under 21. If you already know how to play blackjack, it‚Äôs easy to pick up, and a fun way to keep things fresh. Why So Many Versions? It‚Äôs one of the few casino games where players actually enjoy learning the details. Online casinos give you so many options because people love trying new strategies, side bets, and challenges. And no, card counting isn‚Äôt illegal. But online, you can forget about it. The software constantly reshuffles, so it simply doesn‚Äôt work. You‚Äôre better off focusing on picking a game that suits your style. Final Bets The best part about blackjack is how easy it is to learn, and how hard it is to master. Once you‚Äôve got the basics down, trying out different variations of blackjack is a great way to keep things exciting. Whether you stick with the classic game or branch out to Spanish 21, Perfect Pairs, or Pontoon, you‚Äôll find each one brings something unique to the table. When you‚Äôre ready to experiment, head over to the Slots Paradise blackjack online casino and see what grabs your attention. You might be surprised which of the blackjack variants ends up being your new favorite. Disclaimer: This is a sponsored article and is for informational purposes only. title: OMNI Price Surge: Unpacking the Explosive 175% Jump After Upbit Listing
body: BitcoinWorld OMNI Price Surge: Unpacking the Explosive 175% Jump After Upbit Listing The cryptocurrency market is a place of rapid shifts and incredible opportunities, and few events capture this dynamism quite like a major exchange listing. Recently, the crypto world witnessed an extraordinary spectacle: Omnichain (OMNI) experienced an astonishing OMNI price surge , skyrocketing approximately 175% in a short period following the announcement of its listing on Upbit, South Korea‚Äôs largest cryptocurrency exchange. This dramatic ascent has turned heads, prompting many to ask: what exactly fueled this explosive growth, and what does it mean for the future of OMNI? What Triggered the Phenomenal OMNI Price Surge? The immediate catalyst for the remarkable OMNI price surge was undeniably the Upbit listing announcement. Upbit holds significant sway in the crypto market, particularly within Asia. Its listings often act as powerful catalysts for price movements, a phenomenon sometimes referred to as the ‚ÄòUpbit Effect.‚Äô But why is a listing on this particular exchange so impactful? Increased Liquidity and Accessibility: Upbit boasts a massive user base and substantial trading volumes. A listing instantly makes a token accessible to millions of new potential investors, injecting significant liquidity into its market. More buyers and sellers lead to more robust price discovery. Gateway to the Korean Market: South Korea is a highly active and influential cryptocurrency market. Gaining access to this market via Upbit can expose a token to a fresh wave of capital and speculative interest that might not have been available before. Perceived Legitimacy and Trust: Being listed on a reputable exchange like Upbit often lends a project an air of legitimacy and trust. It suggests that the exchange has conducted its due diligence, which can boost investor confidence and attract new capital. FOMO (Fear Of Missing Out): Rapid price movements, especially after a major listing, often trigger FOMO among traders. This can create a self-fulfilling prophecy where rising prices attract more buyers, pushing the price even higher in the short term. According to Bitcoin World market monitoring, the immediate reaction was palpable. As per CoinMarketCap, OMNI was reported to be trading at $6.82, marking a 143.44% increase over the past 24 hours at the time of the initial surge. This showcases the immediate and powerful impact an Upbit listing can have on a relatively nascent asset. Beyond the Hype: What is Omnichain (OMNI) Really About? While the Upbit listing was the spark, understanding the underlying technology and purpose of Omnichain is crucial for a complete picture. The project aims to address one of the biggest challenges in the blockchain space: interoperability. Omnichain is designed as a secure, unified platform for a rollup-centric future. In simple terms, imagine a future where various blockchains and their associated ‚Äòrollups‚Äô (solutions designed to scale blockchains) need to communicate seamlessly. Omnichain provides the infrastructure for this communication, allowing developers to build applications that can interact across different rollup ecosystems without friction. This is a significant undertaking, given the fragmented nature of the current blockchain landscape. Key aspects of Omnichain‚Äôs vision include: Universal Interoperability: Connecting all rollups and Layer 1 blockchains, enabling seamless asset transfer and communication. Enhanced Security: Building a robust security model to protect cross-chain transactions. Developer-Friendly Environment: Providing tools and infrastructure that simplify the creation of omnichain applications. The long-term value of OMNI will ultimately depend on the successful implementation and adoption of its technology. The recent OMNI price surge may bring increased visibility, but sustained growth will require the project to deliver on its ambitious promises and gain traction within the developer community. Navigating the Volatility: Is This OMNI Price Surge Sustainable? The cryptocurrency market is notorious for its volatility, and post-listing pumps are often followed by corrections. While the initial OMNI price surge was impressive, investors should approach the situation with caution and a clear understanding of market dynamics. Several factors determine whether a post-listing rally is sustainable: Factor Impact on Sustainability Project Fundamentals Strong technology, clear use case, active development, and a dedicated team are crucial for long-term value. Without these, the surge may be purely speculative. Market Sentiment Broader market trends (e.g., Bitcoin‚Äôs performance, regulatory news) can significantly influence an altcoin‚Äôs trajectory. A bearish market could quickly dampen enthusiasm. Trading Volume & Liquidity Sustained high trading volume indicates continued interest. If volume drops significantly after the initial pump, it could signal a lack of genuine demand. Tokenomics The token‚Äôs supply, distribution, vesting schedules, and utility within the ecosystem play a vital role. Unlocking large amounts of tokens could lead to sell pressure. While the initial surge is exciting, experienced investors understand that such rapid gains often attract profit-taking. It is common for prices to correct after such an event as early investors or those who bought in anticipation of the listing decide to sell and realize their gains. The true test of OMNI‚Äôs value will be its ability to hold a significant portion of its gains and build upon them through continued development and adoption. Actionable Insights: What Should Investors Consider Amidst the OMNI Price Surge? For anyone considering OMNI after its significant price movement, a thoughtful and cautious approach is paramount. The temptation to jump into a rapidly rising asset is strong, but prudent investing requires due diligence. Do Your Own Research (DYOR): Before investing, thoroughly research Omnichain‚Äôs whitepaper, team, roadmap, and technology. Understand its unique value proposition and how it aims to solve existing problems in the blockchain space. Don‚Äôt rely solely on price action. Understand the Risks: Cryptocurrencies are inherently volatile. Investing in a token that has already experienced a massive OMNI price surge carries additional risk of a correction. Only invest what you can afford to lose. Consider Your Investment Horizon: Are you a short-term trader looking to capitalize on volatility, or a long-term investor interested in the project‚Äôs fundamental value? Your strategy will dictate your entry and exit points. Risk Management: If you decide to invest, consider setting stop-loss orders to limit potential losses. Avoid putting all your capital into one asset, especially a volatile one. Monitor Market Sentiment: Keep an eye on broader crypto market trends, news related to Omnichain‚Äôs development, and any further exchange listings or partnerships that could impact its price. The market‚Äôs reaction to the Upbit listing is a clear indicator of the power of exchange integrations. However, it is the project‚Äôs long-term utility and adoption that will ultimately determine its enduring success beyond the initial hype of the OMNI price surge . In conclusion, the OMNI price surge following its Upbit listing announcement serves as a vivid reminder of the crypto market‚Äôs potential for explosive growth. While the immediate gains were phenomenal, driven by increased accessibility, liquidity, and market excitement, the long-term sustainability of OMNI‚Äôs value will hinge on the successful execution of its ambitious vision for universal interoperability across the blockchain ecosystem. For investors, this event underscores the importance of thorough research, understanding market dynamics, and implementing sound risk management strategies. The journey of OMNI has just begun, and its path forward will be shaped by both technological advancements and continued market interest. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) 1. What caused the recent OMNI price surge? The primary cause of the recent OMNI price surge was the announcement of its listing on Upbit, a major South Korean cryptocurrency exchange. Listings on large exchanges often lead to increased liquidity, accessibility to new investors, and a boost in perceived legitimacy, which can trigger significant price increases. 2. What is Omnichain (OMNI)? Omnichain (OMNI) is a blockchain project designed to create a secure and unified platform for a rollup-centric future. Its main goal is to enable universal interoperability between various Layer 1 blockchains and their associated rollups, allowing for seamless communication and asset transfer across different ecosystems. 3. Is the OMNI price surge sustainable in the long term? While the initial OMNI price surge was significant, its long-term sustainability depends on several factors, including the project‚Äôs fundamental development, adoption of its technology, broader market sentiment, and the token‚Äôs economic model. Post-listing pumps often experience corrections as early investors take profits. 4. What are the risks associated with investing in OMNI after such a surge? Investing in a cryptocurrency after a rapid price surge carries risks such as potential price corrections due to profit-taking, high volatility, and the possibility that the project‚Äôs long-term adoption may not meet initial expectations. It is crucial to conduct thorough research and only invest what you can afford to lose. 5. Where can I trade OMNI? Following the Upbit listing, OMNI is now available for trading on Upbit and potentially other major cryptocurrency exchanges. Always verify the available trading pairs and exchange liquidity before attempting to trade. 6. How does a listing on Upbit affect a cryptocurrency‚Äôs price? A listing on Upbit can significantly affect a cryptocurrency‚Äôs price by increasing its exposure to the large South Korean market, boosting its liquidity, and enhancing its perceived credibility. This often leads to an immediate surge in demand and price, commonly known as the ‚ÄòUpbit Effect.‚Äô If you found this article insightful, consider sharing it with your network! Help us spread awareness about the dynamic world of cryptocurrency and how market events like the OMNI price surge can impact digital assets. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping altcoin price action. title: RAKBANK debuts crypto brokerage service in UAE
body: Conventional banks, not only in the USA but also in the UAE, have started to embrace the crypto era. Today, UAE-based RAKBANK launched its crypto brokerage service via its mobile app for retail customers, thus enabling crypto trading for its customers. As a start, the service will be offered by invitation only and then rolled out to more customers. RAKBANK is using infrastructure from BitPanda, a UAE-regulated crypto exchange. BitPanda is integrated within RAKBANK‚Äôs mobile banking application, allowing customers to buy, sell, and swap cryptocurrencies. Crypto transactions are executed in AED Bitpanda owns and operates the platform, while RAKBANK offers access using its mobile app and accounts. RAKBANK notes in the press release that all transactions will occur in AED currency, so there will be no foreign currency transfer fees or forex losses. The bank emphasizes that its customers will no longer need to move money in and out of a crypto exchange, because all transactions will be directly executed from the customer‚Äôs current or savings account. Raheel Ahmed, Group CEO of RAKBANK, noted that the bank will be the first conventional bank in the UAE to enable simple, secure, and regulated access to a world-class digital assets platform. He states, ‚ÄúWe believe our customers deserve a more efficient and seamless crypto buying, selling, and swapping journey that is fully regulated and entirely in AED.‚Äù Deputy CEO of BitPanda, Lukas Enzersdorfer-Konrad, viewed the partnership as a big moment for digital assets in the MENA region. He explained, ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre showing how crypto can be offered in a safe, regulated, and simple way, directly from a major conventional bank that customers already trust.‚Äù He adds, ‚ÄúThis is exactly how the future of finance should look: simple, compliant, and built to meet real user needs.‚Äù Are banks taking over the crypto scene? In the UAE, several banks have entered the crypto space, including Mbank, Zand Bank, Liv bank by Emirates NBD, and even FAB bank by integrating their offerings with crypto exchanges , but not in the seamless way that RAKBANK has today. It‚Äôs a new movement whereby banks are entering the crypto space with arms wide open, especially after the Genesis Act was passed in the United States. Just last week, PNC Bank announced that it had partnered with Coinbase to expand access to trusted, secure, and innovative digital asset solutions, offering them a crypto-as-a-service platform. The partnership aims to develop an initial offering that will allow clients to buy, hold, and sell cryptocurrencies. Cryptopolitan Academy: Want to grow your money in 2025? Learn how to do it with DeFi in our upcoming webclass. Save Your Spot

title: Emmer‚Äôs Anti-CBDC Bill Seeks to Limit Fed‚Äôs Digital Currency Power
body: Representative Tom Emmer, a key advocate for financial privacy in the U.S., reaffirmed his commitment to halting the development of a CBDC unless it adheres to strict principles of openness, permissionlessness, and privacy. Emmer noted the progress of his Anti-CBDC Surveillance State Act , which aims to sharply curtail the Federal Reserve‚Äôs authority to issue a digital dollar. Introduced in the House in March, Emmer‚Äôs bill was one of three pieces of crypto-focused legislation passed in July during the Republicans‚Äô ‚Äúcrypto week.‚Äù However, it saw the least Democratic support among the trio, which also included the GENIUS Act targeting payment stablecoins and the Digital Asset Market Clarity (CLARITY) Act focused on digital asset regulation. CBDC Must Emulate Cash, Says Emmer Speaking about the Federal Reserve‚Äôs role, Emmer clarified that while the government can research and explore a digital dollar, the CBDC must function like physical cash‚Äîwithout surveillance features or centralized control. ‚ÄúIf [the Fed] could emulate cash, then the law is going to afford them that ability, but right now, they can‚Äôt,‚Äù he said. The bill proposes amending the Federal Reserve Act to block federal institutions from issuing any digital asset that closely resembles a CBDC unless it conforms to stringent criteria. This includes ensuring any digital dollar remains private, does not require permission to use, and allows open participation‚Äîhallmarks of traditional currency but often difficult to achieve in digital systems. Of the three bills passed by the House on July 18, only the GENIUS Act has so far been signed into law by President Trump , having already cleared the Senate. The remaining two, including Emmer‚Äôs CBDC bill and the CLARITY Act, await further discussion when the Senate reconvenes after its August recess. Senate to Prioritize Market Structure Bill in September Looking ahead, Republican lawmakers are signaling that the Senate‚Äôs primary focus will be the CLARITY Act , aiming to finalize its passage before October. Senator Cynthia Lummis of Wyoming, who chairs the digital assets subcommittee, has been vocal about keeping the Senate in session through August to work on critical nominations, including Brian Quintenz for the Commodity Futures Trading Commission chair. A spokesperson confirmed that Lummis remains committed to advancing President Trump‚Äôs agenda, potentially using the extended session to prepare for deeper work on crypto legislation. As of now, the Senate remains scheduled to go on recess starting August 3. The post Emmer‚Äôs Anti-CBDC Bill Seeks to Limit Fed‚Äôs Digital Currency Power appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

title: How to Buy Hyperliquid‚Äôs HYPE on Transak Following Its Integration Into the Popular Web3 Gateway
body: Everyone‚Äôs talking about Hyperliquid, the perps protocol that‚Äôs dominating onchain futures. They‚Äôre also talking about HYPE, the native token whose rise has been in lockstep with that of Hyperliquid and which has just been listed by Transak . The leading web3 payments provider is picky about the assets it elects to integrate into its fiat-to-crypto onramp, and thus the addition of HYPE is both an endorsement of the Hyperliquid ecosystem and a testament to the token‚Äôs popularity. If you‚Äôve been wanting to get your hands on HYPE for a while now, Transak‚Äôs integration offers arguably the fastest and simplest route to loading up on the Hyperliquid token. This short guide provides everything you need to know about acquiring HYPE through Transak and then putting it to use on Hyperliquid ‚Äì or simply holding it tightly in your wallet while the market does its thing. Buying HYPE With Transak While much of Transak‚Äôs business is B2B, if you‚Äôre a regular crypto user, there‚Äôs a good chance you‚Äôve already used its onramp, since it‚Äôs integrated into a host of centralized and decentralized services. From Uniswap to Binance and Ledger to MetaMask, Transak‚Äôs web3 gateway is integrated industry-wide and supports more than 130 cryptos and is available in 64 countries. But you can also buy and sell crypto directly using Transak‚Äôs website : just click the ‚ÄúBuy crypto‚Äù button at the top of the page and select ‚ÄúBuy as individual‚Äù which will take you to this page. Your preferred fiat currency should be displayed by default, but if it‚Äôs not, use the dropdown menu to make your selection and enter the amount you wish to spend. Then, in the crypto menu ‚Äì which displays ETH by default ‚Äì click to open and type in ‚ÄúHYPE.‚Äù This will produce two options, enabling you to buy HYPE on Hyperliquid or HyperEVM. So what‚Äôs the difference? In short, HyperEVM is the network and Hyperliquid the perps protocol. HYPE serves as the gas token on HyperEVM, and is integrated into the various dapps and DEXs that operate there. If your plan is to explore the HYPE ecosystem of projects, start here. Alternatively, if you intend to use HYPE on Hyperliquid to trade perps, select this option. If you‚Äôre unsure at this point in time, don‚Äôt sweat it; HYPE can easily be bridged between Hyperliquid and HyperEVM and vice-versa using native bridging services. After making your selection, you‚Äôll be prompted to enter the Hyperliquid or HyperEVM wallet address you wish to have the funds sent to. The HYPE ecosystem is supported by a range of leading non-custodial wallets including Trust Wallet and Leap Wallet, so choose whichever one you‚Äôre most comfortable with. The final step to make your first HYPE purchase through Transak is to enter your email address and click the link that‚Äôs sent to you. This will enable you to complete verification and then select the fiat payment method, such as debit card, that you wish to use. Because Transak also supports crypto-to-fiat conversion, you can reverse the process when you wish to sell your HYPE, with funds being credited to your chosen payment destination. If you‚Äôre looking to buy HYPE and aren‚Äôt already active on a centralized exchange that supports the asset, Transak‚Äôs onramp provides a fast and secure way to get hold of the token that everyone‚Äôs talking about. title: The Company Led by Ethereum Co-Founder Joe Lubin Announces It Will Acquire Ethereum! Here Are the Details
body: Joe Lubin, one of the founders of Ethereum, announced that SharpLink Gaming, which he leads, aims to accumulate Ethereum (ETH) as quickly as possible. SharpLink's Joe Lubin: ‚ÄúWe Will Be the Fastest to Collect Ethereum‚Äù With this aggressive strategy, the company aims to get ahead of its competitors in the race for institutional Ethereum treasury. Lubin said in an interview: ‚ÄúIn terms of fully diluted Ethereum per share accumulation, we will be the fastest progressing among Ethereum-focused projects, and even Bitcoin-focused ones if we include them.‚Äù SharpLink Gaming is growing its Ethereum reserves by raising capital daily through at-the-market financing methods. The company also invests its existing ETH holdings through staking, aiming to multiply its position by reinvesting these returns. Joe Lubin is also known as the CEO of Ethereum infrastructure company ConsenSys and one of the eight founding members of Ethereum. SharpLink currently sits in second place with 360,800 ETH (approximately $1.35 billion). Tom Lee's BitMine Immersion Technologies holds the top spot, which holds 566,800 ETH (approximately $2.13 billion). Other names in the top five for ETH holdings include the Ethereum Foundation, The Ether Machine, and PulseChain. Larger players like Coinbase, Bit Digital, and the Golem Foundation also hold over 100,000 ETH. The race to accumulate ETH is believed to be putting upward pressure on Ethereum's price. Behind assets like Bitcoin and Solana, ETH has surged 110% to $3,800 in the last three months. Most of its competitors have had to settle for double-digit gains during the same period. Crypto security analyst Wilson Ye stated the following in a post on social media platform X: ‚ÄúWhat we're seeing is institutional-scale FOMO (fear of missing out). Large players are racing to gain dominant positions ahead of ETF approvals. This competition validates the thesis that ETH is becoming institutional infrastructure.‚Äù SharpLink states that it will adopt a cautious approach to leverage. The company currently has no debt, but is reportedly evaluating new financing options such as issuing convertible bonds. This was a strategy MicroStrategy frequently used in its Bitcoin holdings. Joe Lubin added the following on the subject: ‚ÄúWhatever we do, we will carefully manage risk levels. We will always keep leverage under control.‚Äù Lubin stated that this cautious approach will provide significant benefits to shareholders in the long run. SharpLink‚Äôs aggressive but controlled Ethereum strategy consolidates ETH‚Äôs position in the corporate world, while also signaling the start of a new accumulation race in the market. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: The Company Led by Ethereum Co-Founder Joe Lubin Announces It Will Acquire Ethereum! Here Are the Details

title: Bitcoin (BTC) Breakout Looms: Is a Massive Surge Coming Soon?
body: The Bitcoin price is approaching the top of its bull flag once again. Will there be a definitive breakout? If the breakout is weak, or if it fails to happen, could this be the beginning of the end for this current bull market cycle? A changing Bitcoin cycle? If Bitcoin is to make this current bull market cycle one of the more successful ones, the price is going to need to break out soon. On the other hand, some analysts believe that the typical 4-year cycle is changing, and that the sheer amount of institutional money entering the Bitcoin space will push the end of the cycle out to Q1 or Q2 of 2026. If this is going to be the case, the Bitcoin price would have plenty of time for more consolidation before heading into the final phase. However, if we are still in the 4-year cycle, the clock is starting to run down, with only three or four months left before a potential blow-off top at some time in November perhaps? A huge turnaround in the U.S. stock market Source: TradingView On the macro side of things there are positives for Bitcoin. Recent huge trade deals have been agreed with Japan and the EU, which have led to renewed optimism in the U.S. stock market. The chart above of the S&P 500 shows the most incredible turn around from the depths of pessimism over the Trump tariffs, to the record-breaking surge that is currently being experienced. It‚Äôs in this kind of environment that Bitcoin can generally be expected to surge. Therefore, it is possibly just a matter of time before Bitcoin embarks on another strong rally to the upside. Shallow rejection for $BTC? Source: TradingView The short-term price chart for $BTC reveals that the price was rejected at the top of the bull flag once again. However, the correctional impulse has so far been rather shallow, only descending as far as the important $118,000 horizontal support. From there, the price has bounced back and is once more flirting with the upper trendline of the bull flag. Will there be a breakout from here? It is entirely possible. All shorter term Stochastic RSI indicators have a way to go before reaching their tops, so momentum is still with the $BTC price. Flag or ascending triangle? Source: TradingView As one zooms further out into the daily time frame, the bull flag becomes less reliable as a pattern, with candle wicks rather than candle bodies unsatisfactorily forming some of the touch points. Therefore, there is the possibility of other patterns becoming valid. The chart above shows an ascending triangle pattern, which keeps the touch points to the candle bodies. If this is a valid pattern, it would be a very bullish one. The Stochastic RSI at the bottom of the chart has the indicators now angled back to the upside. This would also tend to suggest that positive price action is likely to follow. Probabilities of more upside price action Source: TradingView The weekly time frame illustrates that whatever the candle pattern is, it does have the sideways movement of a continuation formation. Also, given that this pattern is smaller than previous ones, it is far more likely to break out sooner. Moving down the chart, the Stochastic RSI on this time frame has the indicator lines shaping to cross back down, while at the bottom of the chart, the RSI indicator line may have a bullish bounce from the ascending yellow moving average line. Predicting price movements is a very uncertain art. All the price action and indicators can do is to give hints on probabilities of future price direction. Fundamentally, it does look as though the direction for Bitcoin should be up, but technically this is still uncertain. That said, the probability is of more upward price action rather than downside. title: Analysts Say This DeFi Token Could Outpace Cardano (ADA) and Ripple (XRP) by 2026 With 200x Upside From $0.035
body: As the crypto market begins to separate hype-driven tokens from infrastructure-heavy protocols, analysts are turning their attention toward Mutuum Finance (MUTM) ‚Äîa next-generation DeFi project quietly preparing to reshape on-chain lending. While top altcoins like Cardano (ADA) and Ripple (XRP) continue to face stagnation from regulatory pressure and scalability concerns, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is gaining traction for building a highly flexible, dual-model lending ecosystem that supports both risk-on and conservative digital assets. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) Unlike legacy DeFi protocols that lock users into a single borrowing structure, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is building to introduce two concurrent lending models: peer-to-peer (P2P) for speculative assets like DOGE, SHIB, and PEPE, and peer-to-contract (P2C) for stablecoins and top-tier tokens like ETH and USDC. This two-pronged system is designed to attract a wider spectrum of users‚Äîfrom degen yield chasers to institutional players seeking risk-managed borrowing. Loans issued through both models will require overcollateralization, a safeguard powered by the platform‚Äôs Stability Factor mechanism. This metric continuously monitors loan-to-value ratios, ensuring the protocol remains solvent even during volatile market swings. This type of design not only limits default risk but positions Mutuum Finance (MUTM) as a more reliable long-term play‚Äîone that fits the checklist of both individual investors and large funds looking for compliant, smart contract-enforced lending solutions. And with institutional capital seeking safer ways to enter the DeFi space, MUTM‚Äôs architecture stands out as a high-conviction, low-friction opportunity. Presale Gains Fuel FOMO as Yield Mechanics Power Long-Term Growth Currently in Phase 6 of its presale at a price of $0.035, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is already drawing serious attention. With over $13.7 million raised and more than 14,500 holders onboarded, only 5% of the token supply of the current phase has been distributed so far. The next presale phase will trigger a 15% price increase‚Äîmaking the current window a limited-time entry point for those seeking early-stage, undervalued DeFi gems. The protocol has passed a rigorous audit by CertiK, the industry‚Äôs leading blockchain security firm, scoring 95.00 in Token Scan and 78.00 in Skynet‚Äîtwo of the highest confidence metrics for any upcoming DeFi token. The audit, initiated in February and updated in May 2025, included deep static analysis and manual code reviews. For added transparency and credibility, a $50,000 bug bounty remains live, encouraging ethical developers to report any system vulnerabilities before the mainnet launch. MUTM Rewards The Mutuum Finance (MUTM) ecosystem revolves around mtTokens‚Äîinterest-bearing tokens minted when users deposit assets into lending pools. These tokens accrue yield automatically, increasing in value over time. For users seeking to enhance returns, staking mtTokens in dedicated smart contracts unlocks an additional revenue stream: passive MUTM rewards generated from the platform‚Äôs buyback system. As a portion of protocol revenue will be regularly used to repurchase MUTM from the market, supply pressure is expected to decline over time‚Äîpushing the floor price upward for stakers and holders alike. Take the case of one early investor who reallocated $5,000 from Ethereum (ETH) into Phase 2 of the Mutuum Finance (MUTM) presale at just $0.015 per token. That move secured roughly 333,333 MUTM tokens. At today‚Äôs price of $0.035 in Phase 6, that initial allocation is already worth $11,667‚Äîdelivering an impressive 133% return even before the token hits exchanges. But this story doesn‚Äôt end there. With the confirmed listing price set at $0.06, that same position is on track to grow to a value of $20,000‚Äîrepresenting a full 300%+ return in under a year. Utility Expansion and Beta Launch Set the Stage for Explosive Growth Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is not just a lending hub‚Äîit‚Äôs building a fully integrated ecosystem that will include a decentralized, overcollateralized stablecoin, dynamically minted during loan issuance and burned upon repayment. This design will ensure strict control over supply while maintaining a consistent $1 peg, addressing the shortcomings of failed algorithmic stablecoins in the market. Additionally, the platform is preparing for a beta launch at the time of listing, a major catalyst that will activate real-time borrowing, staking, and liquidation features across its smart contract infrastructure. With plans to launch on a Layer-2 network, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is expected to offer lower gas fees, faster confirmations, and better scalability than most first-gen DeFi platforms. As total value locked (TVL) grows and the stablecoin gains traction, demand for MUTM tokens is projected to accelerate dramatically‚Äîfueled by real use cases rather than empty speculation. The DeFi sector is primed for a new market leader‚Äîone that blends financial utility with tokenholder upside. By creating an open, secure, and flexible lending protocol that appeals to both institutions and retail users, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is quickly rising to challenge established names like Cardano (ADA) and Ripple (XRP). title: Lido Founder Konstantin Lomashuk borrows 85M USDT from Aave for ETH acquisition
body: Lido‚Äôs Founder, Konstantin Lomashuk, was loaned about 85M USDT by lending protocol Aave, which he used to buy ETH. Arkham‚Äôs data showed that Lomashuk first sent 80M USDT to the Amber Group, which deposited all the funds into an exchange. Lookonchain reports revealed that the Lido Founder later withdrew approximately 15.81K ETH, worth about $59.75M, from the exchange. According to Arkham‚Äôs live data, his portfolio currently holds about 69.619K AETHWSETH worth over $318M. It also has about $5M worth of ETH left and slightly over 2K DAI valued at $2.08K. The Arkham data also showed that Lomashuk‚Äôs overall portfolio had increased by at least $9.48M, with the value of AWSTETH holdings jumping from $315.84M to $325.32M in a week (from July 22 to July 29). The holdings remained at $69.8K, but the price of AWSTETH surged from ~$4.5K to ~$4.6K within the same period. However, the total value of the holding dropped by 3.46% in the past 24 hours to $324.65M. Lomashuk says Ethereum is the world‚Äôs ledger Major historical phases of ETH prices. Source: Cyber.Fund . The Lido boss recently claimed that the Ethereum protocol was the world‚Äôs ledger. He and Artem Kotelskiy, the Head of Crypto Research at Cyber Fund, published a report in May claiming that Ethereum was the foundational infrastructure for DeFi. The duo further pointed out that Ethereum had over 25 million global users and processed more than 40% (~$0.5T) of weekly stablecoin volumes. They added that Visa and Stripe have exponentially adopted Ethereum as the base layer. The two industry KOLs said they had been building and investing on top of Ethereum for over a decade because they believed in the ‚Äúvision of permissionless, horizontal coordination.‚Äù They also revealed that they had substantially increased their ETH holdings by 10x over time. Lomashuk and Kotelskiy added that Ethereum was their ‚Äúhighest conviction bet.‚Äù Lido‚Äôs Lomashuk previously teased that he would be building the second generation of Ethereum before he was quickly made to swallow his words following online backlash from industry players. He jokingly stated that he was just messing around with random tweets, saying that ‚Äúa tweet was just a tweet‚Ä¶‚Äù ‚ÄúNo actual second foundation has been created yet‚Ä¶If a second foundation ever does form, it must have a clear purpose that complements the enormous work of current contributors.‚Äù ‚Äì Konstantin Lomashuk , Lido Founder However, the Lomashuk and Koteskiy report asserted that Ethereum‚Äôs most important upgrades were EIP-1559, which redesigned the fee mechanism in the Summer of 2021, and ‚ÄúThe Merge,‚Äù which transitioned the protocol to Proof-of-Stake in the Fall of 2022. ETH is dubbed ‚Äúultrasound money‚Äù According to the Lomashuk and Kotelskiy report, ETH was dubbed ‚Äúultrasound money,‚Äù referencing Bitcoin‚Äôs sound money narrative. Ethereum‚Äôs upgrade from Proof-of-Work to Proof-of-Stake made the protocol 8,000x more energy efficient, as the issuance required to reward nodes securing the ecosystem each year dropped from more than 4% to below 1%. Vitalik Buterin, Ethereum‚Äôs co-founder, outlined plans for the Ethereum Foundation‚Äôs major restructuring in January of this year. He pointed out that the reorganization would address inefficiencies and streamline decision-making. However, his remarks sparked criticism as some argued that the restructuring undermined the network‚Äôs decentralization ethos. Lomashuk recently claimed that Ethereum was the ‚Äúultimate world computer,‚Äù saying that Ethereans could help achieve the network‚Äôs growth, transformation, and success. He appreciated the support from all Ethereum ecosystem users, adding that more organizations needed to contribute to the network. Cryptopolitan Academy: Tired of market swings? Learn how DeFi can help you build steady passive income. Register Now

title: Bitcoin Is A Lifeline, Says Billionaire, As US Faces Debt Time Bomb
body: Ray‚ÄØDalio, the billionaire behind Bridgewater Associates, says people should think about putting 15% of their money into gold or Bitcoin. His call comes as America‚Äôs debt nears the $37 trillion mark. He argues that holding hard assets can help when paper money loses value. Related Reading: Countdown To August 15: What XRP Investors Need To Know ‚ÄúIf you were optimizing your portfolio for the best return-to-risk ratio, you would have around 15% of your money in Bitcoin or gold,‚Äù Dalio said during the Master Investor podcast this week. Dalio admits he owns only a little Bitcoin and still leans toward gold. But he‚Äôs clear that splitting that 15% between the two is up to each investor. Optimizing For A Debt‚ÄëStrained Dollar According to Dalio, the US government will need to sell about $12 trillion more in treasuries over the next year to deal with its growing bill. He pointed out that recent Treasury data shows borrowing in the third quarter of 2025 could hit $1 trillion‚Äî$453 billion above earlier estimates‚Äîand another $590 billion in the fourth quarter. He warns that printing or selling more debt tends to weaken a currency. That‚Äôs why gold and Bitcoin, which aren‚Äôt tied to any central bank‚Äôs balance sheet, can act as buffers against plain old dollars. Balancing Gold And Bitcoin Dalio said gold remains his go‚Äëto choice. It has centuries of track record against inflation and crisis. Bitcoin, on the other hand, is newer and can swing wildly in price. It‚Äôs trading around $118,862, roughly 4% below its July‚ÄØ14 all‚Äëtime high of $123,250. While its ups and downs can add spice to returns, they can also give some investors sleepless nights. Dalio suggests you pick a mix that feels right. If you hate big price moves, tilt toward gold. If you can stomach Bitcoin‚Äôs roller‚Äëcoaster, you might give it a bigger slice. Midway Through The Conversation On Risk He raised the idea back in January‚ÄØ2022 with 1% to 2% in Bitcoin. Now he‚Äôs tripling that bucket. That jump shows how fast the mood can shift when national debt climbs. Dalio noted that other Western nations like the United Kingdom face the same ‚Äúdebt doom loop‚Äù he sees in the US. He said their currencies may lag behind hard assets, making gold and Bitcoin effective diversifiers when government bills keep piling up. Related Reading: Memecoins, NFTs Get Called Out By Their Own Architect: ‚ÄòZero Intrinsic Value‚Äô Role Of Reserve Currencies Despite his nod to Bitcoin, Dalio said it won‚Äôt replace the dollar or euro for central banks. He argued that public blockchains lack privacy. Every transaction is visible, so governments could still watch and intervene. Gold, in contrast, can change hands in private after it leaves the vault. That gives it an edge when you want to keep your holdings off the radar. Featured image from Meta, chart from TradingView

if (parts.length == 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift(); } // Get user token from cookies const userToken = getCookie('user_token'); if (subscribewithoutData === 'true' && userToken) { // Call the modal function with the category ID subscribed_popupmodal(subscribe_clicked_cat_id); // Remove the flag and category ID from localStorage localStorage.removeItem('subscribe_without_Login'); localStorage.removeItem('subscribe_clicked_id'); } }); /************************** update susbcriber content **************************** */ function initializeSubscriptionButton() { var initialListItems = document.querySelectorAll('.subscription-options input[type="checkbox"]'); initialListItems.forEach(function(item) { console.log(item.checked, 'Initial Checkbox checked status'); }); var listItems = document.querySelectorAll('.subscription-options li'); if (listItems.length === 0) return; var anyActive = false; listItems.forEach(function(item) { var checkbox = item.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { if (checkbox.checked) { item.classList.add('active'); anyActive = true; // Set anyActive to true } else { item.classList.remove('active'); // Remove 'active' class if checkbox is unchecked } } }); } function updateButtonText(anyActive) { var subscribeButtonSpan = document.querySelector('.subscribe-submit .changeBtnText'); if (subscribeButtonSpan) { if (anyActive) { subscribeButtonSpan.textContent = 'Subscribe Now'; } else { subscribeButtonSpan.textContent = 'Unsubscribe'; } } } function updateSubscriptionButton() { var listItems = document.querySelectorAll('.subscription-options li'); if (listItems.length === 0) return; var anyActive = false; listItems.forEach(function(item) { var checkbox = item.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { if (checkbox.checked) { item.classList.add('active'); anyActive = true; // Set anyActive to true } else { item.classList.remove('active'); // Remove 'active' class if checkbox is unchecked } } }); // Update the button text based on whether any list item has the 'active' class updateButtonText(anyActive); } document.addEventListener('click', function(event) { var clickedItem = event.target.closest('.subscription-options li'); if (clickedItem) { var checkbox = clickedItem.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { checkbox.checked = !checkbox.checked; updateSubscriptionButton(); } } }); FAQs How high will the PEPE price go in 2025? According to our Pepecoin price forecast, the altcoin‚Äôs price could surge to a maximum of 0.00001688 this year. How much is Pepe coin worth? The current price of Pepecoin is $¬†0.00001189 . How much is 1 Pepe coin in rupees? At the time of writing, Pepe coin price in INR is ‚Çπ0.001037 . Is PEPE an ERC-20 token? Yes, Pepecoin is an ERC-20 token working on the Ethereum blockchain. Is it possible to mine Pepecoin? No, PEPE cannot be mined as it is a non-mineable token. Where to buy Pepe coins? If you want to buy this coin, then you can do so on various exchanges like Binance, OKX, and more. The coin is listed on popular exchanges such as Trust Wallet and Metamask. Who is behind Pepecoin? Interestingly, the project‚Äôs website reveals that there is no established team behind the token, and the creators prefer to remain anonymous. When was Pepecoin launched? Furie introduced Pepecoin in 2021 to reestablish the character‚Äôs positive image. The digital currency has since gained popularity among internet users and cryptocurrency enthusiasts. Is Pepe on Coinbase? Pepecoin is available through Coinbase Wallet. PEPE BINANCE

title: Ika Launches Mainnet to Enable Native Cross-Chain Asset Control on Sui Blockchain
body: Zug, Switzerland, July 29th, 2025, Chainwire Ika , the pioneering blockchain infrastructure provider, has officially launched its mainnet, marking a significant milestone in blockchain interoperability. The launch introduces the first-ever zero-trust multiparty computation (MPC) network capable of native cross-chain asset control directly from smart contracts on the Sui blockchain. Ika‚Äôs protocol allows Sui-based smart contracts to securely and seamlessly manage native assets across many blockchains, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, and modern L1s and L2s, without relying on bridges, token wrapping, or trusted third parties. This breakthrough eliminates common risks associated with cross-chain solutions, such as vulnerabilities inherent in bridging protocols or wrapped tokens, fundamentally transforming blockchain interoperability. At the heart of Ika‚Äôs innovation is the introduction of dWallets, a decentralized, programmable, and transferable signing mechanism. dWallets enable both the user and the Ika network to collaboratively sign transactions, while enforcing logic governed by smart contracts. This empowers developers and institutions to build and operate securely across various blockchains with native asset control. The technological core of Ika is its novel 2PC-MPC cryptography protocol, previously thought impractical for decentralized environments due to latency, scalability, and security constraints. Ika has overcome these hurdles, delivering sub-second latency and linear scalability, without compromising on decentralization, delivering a network that can be supported by hundreds of operators globally. Each operation includes cryptographic safeguards that require explicit user participation, supporting a zero-trust security framework. The network‚Äôs native token, IKA, plays a critical role by securing the infrastructure through a decentralized, permissionless proof-of-stake consensus mechanism. IKA tokens are integral for transaction fees, spam prevention, rewarding reliable operators, and network governance. Several leading blockchain projects on Sui are already utilizing Ika‚Äôs mainnet, demonstrating the protocol‚Äôs versatility and robustness: Native is enhancing Bitcoin liquidity through native lending and DeFi services. Human Tech delivers "Wallet-as-a-Protocol" solutions, seamlessly managing cross-chain assets. Rhei Finance offers institutional-grade zero-trust multi-chain DeFi services. Aeon advances decentralized custody solutions optimized for AI-driven financial management. Nativerse pioneers Bitcoin-backed stablecoins without synthetic or wrapped intermediaries. Ekko integrates AI chatbots with decentralized security via MPC technology. Legacy Link facilitates secure digital asset inheritance through streamlined estate management. Full Sail introduces an advanced Automated Market Maker (AMM) leveraging Ika‚Äôs interoperability. "Today marks the start of a new era in blockchain interoperability," said Ika Co-Founder Omer Sadika. "Our mainnet launch is not just a technological milestone, but a paradigm shift, bringing native Zero-Trust interoperability to Sui , and unlocking unprecedented possibilities for developers, institutions, and individual users alike." With Ika now live, blockchain projects, financial institutions, and developers can deploy multi-chain applications on Sui, operate as network participants, or engage with the Ika network. For further information, users can visit https://ika.xyz or follow Ika on X . About Ika Ika is the fastest parallel MPC network, offering sub-second latency, unprecedented scale and decentralization, and zero-trust security. As the premier choice for interoperability, decentralized custody, and chain abstraction, Ika is set to revolutionize digital asset security and multi-chain DeFi. Users can learn more here ContactIka PRpr@ika.xyz Disclaimer: This is a sponsored press release and is for informational purposes only. It does not reflect the views of Crypto Daily, nor is it intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, or financial advice.

title: Investment Giant Ark Invest Prepares to Launch Staking Services for This Altcoin! Partnership Process Has Begun! Details Here
body: Cathie Wood-led investment firm ARK Invest has taken another significant step into the crypto market, forming a strategic partnership with Canadian-based SOL Strategies for staking services. This partnership reflects the growing appetite among institutions for yield-generating crypto assets. ARK Invest Forms Staking Partnership with SOL Strategies: Institutional Demand Continues to Rise ARK Invest will now migrate its validator operations onto SOL Strategies' staking infrastructure as part of the company's Digital Assets Revolutions Fund. Founded in 2020, the fund aims to generate returns over a 4‚Äì5-year market cycle by investing in 10 to 12 cryptocurrencies. SOL Strategies CEO Leah Wald told Cointelegraph: ‚ÄúWe serve corporate and institutional-level clients seeking regulated and reliable access to Solana through delegated staking and customized validator infrastructure.‚Äù Another key player in the partnership is institutional custody platform BitGo. Having partnered with SOL Strategies in April, BitGo will also be part of this new model. What is Staking and Why is it Important? Staking is the process of securing a blockchain network by locking cryptocurrencies for a specific period of time and earning rewards in return. On the Solana network, staking periods (epochs) last approximately two to three days, at the end of which stakers receive rewards in SOL. According to Wald, the staking operations the company currently manages include: 5 active validators are working, 3.59 million SOL (approximately $647.2 million) worth of assets are being staked, More than 5,700 different wallets are actively staking. Only 12% of staked assets come from the company treasury, while the rest is held by third parties. While staking offers the potential for high returns, it can be risky due to validator behavior. Validators who violate network rules may be penalized through ‚Äúslashing‚Äù of their staked tokens. According to Solana Compass data, there are currently 403 million SOL tokens staked, worth approximately $73.5 billion. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Investment Giant Ark Invest Prepares to Launch Staking Services for This Altcoin! Partnership Process Has Begun! Details Here

title: Little Pepe Presale Raises $13.7M‚ÄîWhat You Need to Know About The Hottest Meme Coin of 2025
body: Except for its name, nothing is little about Little Pepe ($LILPEPE). Not its ambition, token giveaway, nor the amount raised. The project itself wants to take meme coins to the next level with its Little Pepe Layer 2 blockchain. Once launched, this will deliver the speed, security, and low fees that modern meme coins need. With the L2, common issues with popular blockchains like Ethereum and Solana will be addressed once and for all. But this journey needs support, which is where the Little Pepe ($LILPEPE) token presale comes in. What‚Äôs the Little Pepe Presale All About? It‚Äôs a fundraising effort that will allow you to take a direct hand at making the L2 happen. Costing only $0.0017 each, it‚Äôs a very affordable way to invest in the project. To date, Little Pepe has raised over $13.7M, making it one of the year‚Äôs best crypto to watch . If you spend at least $100 in the presale and complete tasks, you‚Äôll get the chance to join the project‚Äôs $777K giveaway . This prize pool will be divided equally between 10 winners, which means you‚Äôll receive $77K worth of $LILPEPE tokens. To get started, head on to the Little Pepe presale page, connect your crypto wallet, enter how many tokens you want to buy, and pay with your credit/debit card, $ETH, or $USDT. From the Earth to the Moon: The Little Pepe Roadmap Like every token presale, Little Pepe‚Äôs goal is to go to the moon. To get there, it has a three-phase roadmap, with the presale happening at stage 1. Right now, the team is also building partnerships and creating buzz to make the project even more viral. When it‚Äôs moon-ready, the token will be launched in the market‚Äôs top exchanges and on Uniswap. This will add further hype to the project as investors buy and trade $LILPEPE. Finally comes the blockchain launch. With an ambitious goal of hitting the top 100 in CoinMarketCap, Little Pepe is taking the right steps to get there. This is where its tokenomics comes in. Tale of the Tape: Little Pepe in Numbers Little Pepe ($LILPEPE) has a total supply of 100B tokens. A huge chunk of this will go towards Chain Reserves (30%) and the Presale (26.5%), which ensure the project‚Äôs stability well after the chain is launched. Another thing to note is its Marketing budget (10%). As meme coins rely heavily on hype, this token allocation will allow Little Pepe to get the buzz it needs to succeed, particularly in the early stages of the presale. When it comes to marketing, the team plans on collaborating with influencers, spreading memes and videos, and potentially putting up a billboard to get the word out both online and offline. Slowly But Surely: The Little Pepe Vesting Schedule Little Pepe will also have a token vesting schedule , which will be as follows: TGE ‚Äì 0% of tokens will be unlocked at launch Cliff ‚Äì Tokens will be locked for a further three months Vesting ‚Äì 5% of $LILPEPE tokens will be released every 30 days after the cliff This means that not all tokens will be released post-presale, but rather gradually over time. The strategy is important for several reasons. For one, this helps prevent sell-offs that can crash the token‚Äôs price. It also signals that the team is here for the long term and not for short-term gains. Finally, this allows everyone‚Äîfrom the developers to investors‚Äîto grow with the project. Time to Hop In‚ÄîThe Little Pepe Hype Train is Here With its goal to dominate the meme coin marketplace, Little Pepe ($LILPEPE) is making bold moves to make it happen. It‚Äôs no surprise that it‚Äôs already raised over $13.7M in its presale, with plenty of room for growth as it progresses. If you‚Äôre ready to join the Little Pepe hype train, then head on to its official presale page and grab some coins.

title: Bitcoin Demand: The Crucial Shift as US Investors Await Lower Prices
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Demand: The Crucial Shift as US Investors Await Lower Prices Are you feeling the chill in the crypto air? Recent reports suggest a significant shift in the landscape of Bitcoin demand , particularly among investors in the United States. It appears a ‚Äòwait-and-see‚Äô approach is taking hold, with many anticipating a dip in prices before re-entering the market. This isn‚Äôt just a hunch; market indicators are painting a clear picture of this evolving sentiment. Understanding the Current State of Bitcoin Demand According to Arab Chain, a respected contributor at CryptoQuant, the appetite for Bitcoin (BTC) among U.S. investors has noticeably cooled. This observation isn‚Äôt just anecdotal; it‚Äôs backed by the behavior of key market indicators. For anyone tracking the pulse of the crypto market, understanding these shifts in Bitcoin demand is crucial for navigating potential price movements. The primary tool for gauging U.S. investor interest in Bitcoin is the Coinbase Bitcoin Premium Index. This index measures the price difference between BTC traded on Coinbase‚Äôs USD market and Binance‚Äôs USDT market. A positive premium indicates stronger buying pressure from U.S. investors, who typically use Coinbase for their USD-denominated trades. Conversely, a shrinking or negative premium suggests declining U.S. buying interest. The Coinbase Premium Index: A Key Indicator for Bitcoin Demand The Coinbase Bitcoin Premium Index has recently experienced a sharp decline. While it remains positive, its significant drop signals a clear change in investor behavior. Let‚Äôs break down what this index tells us about Bitcoin demand : Positive Premium: Historically, a strong positive premium has indicated robust U.S. buying pressure, often preceding or accompanying upward price movements. It means U.S. investors are willing to pay a slight premium for Bitcoin. Declining Premium: A sharp drop, even if still positive, suggests that U.S. investors are becoming less aggressive buyers. They are no longer eager to pay a premium, indicating a pause or a re-evaluation of their positions. Negative Premium: If the index were to dip into negative territory, it would signify that U.S. investors are actively selling or are completely disengaged from buying. This typically precedes or accompanies a market correction or prolonged consolidation. Historical Precedent: When U.S. Bitcoin Demand Surged History often provides valuable lessons, and the current situation is no exception. Arab Chain highlighted that U.S. Bitcoin demand historically surged when Bitcoin traded below $105,000. This period saw significant accumulation by U.S. investors, contributing to upward price momentum. What does this tell us? It suggests a psychological threshold or a perceived ‚Äòfair value‚Äô that U.S. investors are comfortable buying at. When prices are above this comfort zone, they tend to hold back, waiting for a more opportune entry point. This pattern underscores the importance of understanding investor psychology in driving market trends. What Drives Investor Caution? Factors Influencing Current Bitcoin Demand Several factors could be contributing to this cautious approach among U.S. investors, influencing overall Bitcoin demand : Factor Impact on Bitcoin Demand Macroeconomic Uncertainty High inflation, interest rate hikes, and recession fears can lead investors to de-risk, reducing speculative investments like crypto. Regulatory Environment Uncertainty or tightening regulations in the U.S. can make investors hesitant, fearing potential restrictions or market disruptions. Profit-Taking & Market Cycles After significant rallies, investors often take profits, leading to temporary dips in demand as they await new entry points. Halving Cycle Dynamics Post-halving, there‚Äôs often a period of consolidation before the next major bull run, leading to reduced immediate buying pressure. Geopolitical Tensions Global instability can prompt a flight to safety, but for some, it might mean reducing exposure to volatile assets like crypto. What Happens Next? Potential Scenarios for Bitcoin Demand The current state of Bitcoin demand sets the stage for several potential scenarios. Understanding these can help investors prepare: Continued Consolidation: If the Coinbase Premium Index continues to hover in low positive territory, it could signal a period of sideways trading, where Bitcoin‚Äôs price moves within a relatively narrow range. This ‚Äòcalm before the storm‚Äô can be frustrating for traders but might offer accumulation opportunities for long-term holders. Market Correction: A move into negative territory for the premium index would strongly suggest a more significant market correction. This would imply U.S. investors are selling off their holdings, potentially leading to a sharper price decline. Resurgent Demand: Should Bitcoin‚Äôs price drop to a level perceived as attractive (e.g., closer to the historical $105,000 threshold or another significant support level), we could see a rapid resurgence in U.S. Bitcoin demand , driving prices back up. Actionable Insights for Navigating Shifting Bitcoin Demand In a market characterized by fluctuating Bitcoin demand , what should an investor do? Here are some actionable insights: Monitor Key Indicators: Keep a close eye on the Coinbase Bitcoin Premium Index and other on-chain metrics. These provide real-time insights into market sentiment and potential shifts in demand. Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA): Instead of trying to time the bottom, consider implementing a DCA strategy. This involves investing a fixed amount at regular intervals, regardless of price, which can smooth out your average purchase price over time. Set Price Alerts: If you‚Äôre waiting for lower prices, set alerts at key support levels or psychological thresholds where you‚Äôd be comfortable re-entering the market. Diversify Your Portfolio: While Bitcoin is a cornerstone, a diversified crypto portfolio can help mitigate risks associated with the volatility of a single asset. Stay Informed: The crypto market is highly dynamic. Keep up-to-date with macroeconomic news, regulatory developments, and on-chain analysis to make informed decisions. The Challenges and Benefits of Patience in Bitcoin Demand The current market sentiment presents both challenges and potential benefits. The main challenge is the uncertainty and the psychological test of waiting while others might be buying or selling. It requires discipline to resist FOMO (Fear Of Missing Out) or FUD (Fear, Uncertainty, and Doubt). However, the benefits of patience can be substantial. By waiting for lower prices, investors can potentially achieve a better entry point, leading to higher returns when the market eventually recovers. It‚Äôs about strategic positioning rather than reactive trading. Understanding the underlying drivers of Bitcoin demand empowers you to make more calculated moves. The observed decline in U.S. Bitcoin demand , as evidenced by the Coinbase Bitcoin Premium Index, signals a period of cautious anticipation among investors. This ‚Äòwait-and-see‚Äô approach is a natural response to elevated prices and historical buying patterns. While it suggests potential for further consolidation or even a correction, it also highlights the strategic patience of investors aiming for more favorable entry points. The crypto market remains a dynamic arena, and staying informed about these crucial shifts in Bitcoin demand is paramount for making well-timed investment decisions. As the market evolves, understanding these nuances will be key to navigating its complexities and capitalizing on future opportunities. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) About Bitcoin Demand Q1: What is the Coinbase Bitcoin Premium Index and why is it important for understanding Bitcoin demand ? The Coinbase Bitcoin Premium Index measures the price difference between Bitcoin on Coinbase‚Äôs USD market and Binance‚Äôs USDT market. It‚Äôs crucial because Coinbase is a primary on-ramp for U.S. institutional and retail investors using fiat currency. A positive premium indicates strong U.S. buying pressure, reflecting high Bitcoin demand from this key demographic, while a declining or negative premium suggests reduced interest. Q2: Does a decline in U.S. Bitcoin demand always lead to a price drop? Not necessarily immediately, but it often indicates a weakening of buying pressure that can lead to consolidation or a correction. While U.S. demand is significant, global demand and other factors also play a role. However, a sustained decline in U.S. Bitcoin demand typically signals a less bullish outlook for the short to medium term. Q3: What does it mean for U.S. investors to be ‚Äòawaiting lower prices‚Äô? It means investors believe current Bitcoin prices are overvalued or too high for their comfort, and they are holding off on making new purchases. They are anticipating a market correction or a dip to more attractive price levels before they commit new capital, indicating a strategic patience in their approach to Bitcoin demand . Q4: How can individual investors track changes in Bitcoin demand ? Individual investors can track changes in Bitcoin demand by monitoring on-chain metrics like the Coinbase Bitcoin Premium Index (available on platforms like CryptoQuant), exchange inflows/outflows, stablecoin inflows, and trading volumes. Following reputable crypto analysts and news sources can also provide insights into market sentiment. Q5: Is this decline in Bitcoin demand a sign of a bear market? While a decline in U.S. Bitcoin demand can be a precursor to a market correction, it doesn‚Äôt automatically signal a full bear market. It could be a period of consolidation or a temporary pause before the next leg up. A bear market typically involves prolonged price depreciation, significant FUD, and a broader loss of confidence across the market. This specific indicator points to cautious sentiment rather than outright panic. If you found this article insightful, please share it with your friends, family, and fellow crypto enthusiasts on social media! Your shares help us continue to provide valuable market analysis and keep the community informed. To learn more about the latest Bitcoin demand trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action. This post Bitcoin Demand: The Crucial Shift as US Investors Await Lower Prices first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: US dollar rallies to 5-week high as bond markets steady ahead of data release
body: The dollar climbed to its highest level in over five weeks on Tuesday, as traders across global currency markets repositioned ahead of a packed week of U.S. economic reports. The Bloomberg Dollar Spot Index rose 0.3%, reaching its strongest level since June 23, according to Bloomberg. That gain came as the greenback advanced against every Group-of-10 currency, with the euro suffering the most losses. The U.S. dollar has gained against other currencies. Source: Bloomberg European currencies dropped after the European Union finalized a trade agreement with the United States on Sunday. The deal, instead of easing fears, intensified concerns over how it could affect the EU‚Äôs economic outlook. The euro fell to its weakest level in more than a month, adding to the momentum behind the greenback. Yields slide as Fed holds rates steady U.S. Treasury yields slipped early Tuesday ahead of the Federal Reserve‚Äôs policy meeting. As of press time, the 10-year yield has dropped 1.6 basis points to 4.404%. The 30-year yield moved lower by 2.1 basis points to 4.944%, while the 2-year barely moved, sitting at 3.92%. Bond prices and yields move in opposite directions. Traders in the fed funds futures market have priced in a 97% chance that the Fed will hold rates steady at 4.25% to 4.5%, as measured by the CME FedWatch tool. The Fed begins its two-day meeting Tuesday, with a decision expected Wednesday. Ed Yardeni, president of Yardeni Research, said, ‚ÄúOdds are that it will be a non-event.‚Äù He added that the only thing worth watching is whether the FOMC keeps repeating the line: ‚ÄúWe are in no rush to lower interest rates,‚Äù or gives any hint of changing course. David Kohl, chief economist at Julius Baer, echoed that. He doesn‚Äôt expect any rate cuts until September. ‚ÄúIf there is more certainty that the tariff-driven inflation spike is only transitory,‚Äù David said , ‚Äúthe Fed will be able to adopt a neutral policy stance in 2026, with an additional two rate cuts of 25 basis points.‚Äù Focus turns to inflation, labor data, and Trump‚Äôs tariffs Markets are bracing for a string of U.S. data releases this week, which are expected to offer more signs that the economy remains strong. July‚Äôs consumer confidence data is due Tuesday, along with the JOLTS job openings report. On Thursday, the personal consumption expenditures (PCE) index, the Fed‚Äôs preferred measure of inflation, will be released. Analysts expect the data to show annual inflation climbing from 2.3% to 2.4%, based on projections from FactSet. The inflation numbers will also reflect the impact of tariffs, which have returned to the spotlight as President Donald Trump pushes his trade agenda. The recent deal between the EU and the U.S. wasn‚Äôt the only headline over the weekend. On Sunday, Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick told reporters that a 90-day extension of the truce with China is likely. That extension could slow down inflation fears if it prevents new tariffs from kicking in. Meanwhile, the greenback is recovering from losses seen earlier this month, as traders adjust to the reality of Trump‚Äôs trade moves. The added clarity from the administration appears to be easing some of the market‚Äôs hesitation. Currency analysts say the dollar‚Äôs rally is being driven by a change in sentiment. ‚ÄúFor now at least, the focus for FX market participants has moved away from the trade uncertainty and on to the resilience of the US economy,‚Äù said Derek Halpenny, head of research for global markets at MUFG. ‚ÄúThat is clearly helping to prompt some short dollar position liquidation built up through the first half of the year.‚Äù KEY Difference Wire : the secret tool crypto projects use to get guaranteed media coverage

title: Bitcoin Exchange Upbit Announces Listing of New Altcoin on Spot Trading Platform! Here Are the Details
body: Upbit, one of South Korea's leading digital asset exchanges, made an important listing announcement for its users. Omni Network (OMNI) Listed on Upbit KRW Market According to the company's official statement, Omni Network (OMNI) will begin trading on July 29, 2025, in KRW (South Korean Won) currency pair. Listing Details Entity: Omni Network (OMNI) Market: KRW Network: Ethereum Transaction Start Time: July 29, 2025, 18:30 Previous BTC Price: 0.00002137 BTC (approximately 3,472 KRW) Transaction Restrictions During the first 5 minutes: Buy orders will be temporarily limited. Within the first 5 minutes: Sell orders that are 10% below the previous day's closing price will be blocked. During the first 2 hours: Only limit orders will be accepted. Network and Security Alerts Only OMNI transactions made via the Ethereum network are supported. Transfers made via other networks will be invalid. The official contract address of the OMNI token is: 0x36e66fbbce51e4cd5bd3c62b637eb411b18949d4 Transfers can only be made from wallet addresses whose ownership has been confirmed. In case of high-amount transfers from unknown sources, proof of the source of the funds may be requested. What is the Omni Network (OMNI)? Omni Network stands out as a Layer 1 blockchain developed to resolve the liquidity, user, and developer divides that have emerged with the rapid increase in the number of rollups in the Ethereum ecosystem. The network aims to provide fast and secure data transmission between different chains using Dual Chain Architecture and Integrated Consensus technologies. Omni Network also offers a high level of security and protocol stability with the ‚Äúrestaking‚Äù mechanism on Ethereum thanks to the EigenLayer AVS (Active Validated Service) protocol. The OMNI token is available on the platform: Payment of transaction fees, Staking and delegation, It can be used for various purposes such as on-chain governance. This listing further demonstrates Upbit's support for emerging projects within the Ethereum ecosystem. *This is not investment advice.
