title: July 2025 Could Create Crypto Millionaires: 5 Meme Tokens Set to Explode by August
body: July 2025 is shaping up to be a pivotal month for cryptocurrency enthusiasts. Five meme tokens are rumored to be on the verge of significant growth by August. This surge could mint new millionaires overnight. The identities of these tokens and the factors behind their expected rise are intriguing topics worth exploring. Price Prediction for XYZVerse ($XYZ): Is a 30x Jump Possible? XYZVerse has entered the meme coin market at a time when community-driven tokens continue to dominate speculative trading. The rise of meme coins like PEPE , Dogwifhat , and Bonk proves that strong branding, viral marketing, and community engagement can drive massive gains. The broader market sentiment also plays a key role in XYZVerse‚Äôs potential. As the altcoin season is about to start, lower-cap meme coins are seeing increased investor interest. Given that XYZVerse is still in presale, it could benefit from this wave if it secures strategic exchange listings and maintains community hype post-launch. Key Strengths of XYZVerse in the Current Market: Strong branding with sports and influencer partnerships, broadening its appeal Deflationary mechanics (17.13% token burn) to reduce supply pressure Liquidity allocation (15%) to support stability after launch Community incentives (10%) fostering engagement and holding Price Prediction for $XYZ Current Presale Price: $0.005 Projected Post-Presale Target: $0.10 (as per project‚Äôs estimates) Potential ATH (First 1-2 Weeks Post-Launch): $0.15 ‚Äì $0.25 (if demand surges and listings drive FOMO) Long-Term Potential (6-12 Months): $0.20 ‚Äì $0.40 (if the project secures major partnerships and listings) Buy $XYZ Early for Maximum Gains Realistic Expectations: Will XYZ Hit $0.10? A 30x jump from presale to $0.10 is possible but depends on: Strong Exchange Listings ‚Äì If XYZVerse lands on major CEX platforms like KuCoin, OKX, or Binance, its price could skyrocket on launch day. Sustained Community Growth ‚Äì Meme coins need viral momentum. If XYZVerse delivers on its sports influencer partnerships, it could drive massive social media engagement. Market Conditions ‚Äì If Bitcoin and altcoins remain bullish, speculation-driven assets like XYZVerse tend to benefit. Is a 3000% Surge Possible for $XYZ? XYZVerse has the ingredients for a strong launch, but its long-term success depends on execution. If the team delivers strong marketing, high-profile listings, and real community engagement, the $0.10+ target, which is around 3000% from the current price, could be achievable. Invest in $XYZ Before It Surges From Meme to Mainstream: Dogecoin‚Äôs Unlikely Rise in the Crypto World Dogecoin started as a joke in 2013, featuring a Shiba Inu dog as its mascot. Created by Billy Marcus and Jackson Palmer, it was meant to be a fun alternative to serious cryptocurrencies. Unlike Bitcoin, which has a limited supply, Dogecoin has no cap, and 10,000 new coins are mined every minute. This abundance was part of the humor, but things took a surprising turn in 2021. Influenced by social media buzz and endorsements from figures like Elon Musk, Dogecoin‚Äôs value skyrocketed. It became one of the top ten cryptocurrencies, with a market cap exceeding $50 billion. This surge showed how a strong community and online trends can impact financial markets. Despite its playful origins, Dogecoin has potential. Its technology allows for fast and low-cost transactions, making it practical for everyday use. Compared to other coins that focus on scarcity, Dogecoin‚Äôs plentiful nature could make it more accessible. In the current market, where many are looking for the next big thing, Dogecoin stands out because of its unique story and community support. While some might see it as just a meme, others consider it an underdog with room to grow. As the crypto market evolves, Dogecoin‚Äôs blend of fun and functionality makes it an interesting coin to watch. Shiba Inu: The Memecoin Making Waves on Ethereum Shiba Inu (SHIB) is a cryptocurrency that started as a meme, inspired by Dogecoin. Launched in August 2020 by the mysterious Ryoshi, SHIB runs on Ethereum, allowing it to interact with many apps. It began with a huge supply of one quadrillion tokens. Half were sent to Vitalik Buterin, Ethereum‚Äôs co-creator, to build trust. Buterin donated a large portion to India‚Äôs COVID relief and burned 40% of the total supply, catching the crypto world‚Äôs attention. Because SHIB is on Ethereum, it has more potential than some other coins. It launched ShibaSwap, its own exchange. There are plans for an NFT platform and a system where users can vote on changes. In today‚Äôs market, SHIB‚Äôs ties to Ethereum could be a big advantage, especially as more people get interested in decentralized finance. Compared to other meme coins, SHIB might offer more uses. As the crypto world changes, SHIB could be an interesting coin to follow. PEPE‚Äôs Meteoric Rise: The Memecoin Shaking Up the Crypto Scene PEPE is a deflationary memecoin launched on the Ethereum network as a tribute to the iconic Pepe the Frog internet meme created by Matt Furie. Since its introduction, PEPE has ridden the wave of meme-based cryptocurrencies like Dogecoin and Shiba Inu, aiming to establish itself among the top in this playful yet impactful sector. Embracing its memecoin identity, PEPE keeps things simple and straightforward with a no-tax policy and openly acknowledges its lack of utility, which appeals to a community seeking fun and uncomplicated crypto experiences. In late April to May 2023, PEPE witnessed an explosive surge, pushing its market cap to a remarkable $1.6 billion at one point. This rapid ascent turned early adopters into millionaires and sparked a ‚Äúmemecoin season,‚Äù inspiring the launch of numerous other meme-themed tokens. While the volatility of such coins is notable, PEPE‚Äôs roadmap shows ambition with plans for listings on major exchanges and a ‚Äúmeme takeover.‚Äù As the crypto market anticipates the upcoming Bitcoin halving cycle, PEPE stands out as a symbol of the entertainment and unpredictability that memecoins bring to the industry. Whether it continues to soar or settles down remains to be seen, but its impact on current market trends is undeniable. Dogwifhat (WIF): The New Meme Coin Barking Up Solana‚Äôs Tree Dogwifhat (WIF) is the latest dog-themed meme coin making waves on the Solana blockchain. Inspired by the viral Dogwifhat meme, WIF brings a playful twist to the crypto world. Meme coins like WIF thrive on community spirit and internet culture, often becoming sensations overnight. With its roots in a popular meme and the speed of the Solana network, Dogwifhat aims to combine fun with fast transactions. But as with many meme coins, the appeal lies more in the excitement and community than in traditional fundamentals. In the current market, meme coins continue to capture attention, especially those with a canine connection. While established coins like Dogecoin and Shiba Inu have paved the way, Dogwifhat offers a fresh entry with its unique meme inspiration. The Solana blockchain provides WIF with scalability and low fees, which could enhance its adoption. However, investors should be cautious. Meme coins are known for their volatility and high supply, which can lead to sharp price swings. For those willing to embrace the risks for the potential of high rewards and community engagement, WIF might be an intriguing option. As always, it‚Äôs important to stay informed and consider the risks before diving in. Conclusion While DOGE, SHIB, PEPE, and WIF show potential, XYZVerse (XYZ) emerges as the standout, uniting sports fans in a memecoin aiming for 20,000% growth. title: BitMine‚Äôs Bold $1 Billion Share Buyback: A Strategic Move for Crypto Holders
body: BitcoinWorld BitMine‚Äôs Bold $1 Billion Share Buyback: A Strategic Move for Crypto Holders In a significant development that has sent ripples across both the traditional finance and cryptocurrency sectors, BitMine Immersion Technologies has announced a monumental financial maneuver. The company‚Äôs board has given the green light to a substantial stock repurchase program, totaling up to $1 billion . This strategic decision, funded in part by BitMine‚Äôs impressive $401 million in cash reserves and underpinned by its considerable holdings of 625,000 ETH and 192 BTC , signals a strong vote of confidence from the company‚Äôs leadership. This news, reported by PR Newswire , positions the BitMine share buyback as a key event for investors to watch. Understanding the BitMine Share Buyback: What is a Stock Repurchase? Before diving into the specifics of BitMine‚Äôs announcement, it‚Äôs crucial to understand what a stock repurchase, or share buyback, entails. Essentially, it‚Äôs a corporate action where a company buys back its own shares from the open market. This reduces the number of outstanding shares, which can have several positive implications for existing shareholders. Companies typically undertake a share buyback for a variety of reasons: Boosting Shareholder Value: By reducing the number of shares, each remaining share represents a larger percentage of company ownership, potentially increasing earnings per share (EPS). Returning Capital to Shareholders: Instead of issuing dividends, which are taxed immediately, a buyback can be a more tax-efficient way to return value to investors. Signaling Confidence: A buyback often indicates that management believes the company‚Äôs stock is undervalued, sending a positive signal to the market. Improving Financial Ratios: Reduced share count can improve key financial metrics, making the company appear more attractive to investors. Offsetting Dilution: If a company issues new shares (e.g., for employee stock options), a buyback can counteract the dilutive effect. The decision for a BitMine share buyback of this magnitude suggests a calculated move to optimize its capital structure and enhance shareholder returns in a unique market landscape. BitMine‚Äôs Strategic Play: Unpacking the $1 Billion Program BitMine Immersion Technologies, a prominent player in the crypto mining and technology space, is making a definitive statement with its latest financial move. The approval of a $1 billion stock repurchase program is not just a routine financial decision; it‚Äôs a bold declaration of financial strength and strategic intent. Here‚Äôs a closer look at the key elements of this significant announcement: Scale of the Program: A staggering $1 billion is earmarked for the share buyback. This represents a substantial commitment, especially for a company operating in the volatile cryptocurrency sector. It demonstrates BitMine‚Äôs confidence in its long-term prospects and its current valuation. Funding Mechanism: The program will be funded from BitMine‚Äôs existing financial resources. Crucially, the company boasts $401 million in cash . This strong cash position provides the immediate liquidity needed to initiate and sustain such a large-scale repurchase without relying on external financing. Crypto Holdings as a Strategic Asset: What truly sets BitMine apart is its significant digital asset portfolio. The company holds 625,000 ETH (Ethereum) and 192 BTC (Bitcoin) . While the immediate funding for the buyback comes from cash, these substantial crypto holdings serve as a powerful underlying asset base, offering both potential future liquidity and a testament to the company‚Äôs core business model. The value of these assets can fluctuate, but their presence provides a unique dimension to BitMine‚Äôs financial strategy. This BitMine share buyback is a testament to the company‚Äôs robust balance sheet and its willingness to deploy capital in a manner that directly benefits its investors. What Does This Mean for Investors? Benefits of a Share Buyback For current and prospective investors, the announcement of a BitMine share buyback carries several potential positive implications. How might this strategic move impact your investment? 1. Potential for Increased Share Price: When a company reduces the number of its outstanding shares, the supply of shares in the market decreases. If demand remains constant or increases, this can lead to an upward pressure on the share price. Investors holding shares before the buyback could see the value of their holdings appreciate. 2. Enhanced Earnings Per Share (EPS): EPS is calculated by dividing a company‚Äôs net income by the number of outstanding shares. By reducing the share count, even if net income remains the same, EPS will increase. A higher EPS often makes a company appear more profitable and attractive to investors, potentially driving up its stock multiple. 3. Improved Return on Equity (ROE): Share buybacks can also improve a company‚Äôs ROE, a key profitability metric. With fewer shares, the equity base shrinks, which can boost ROE, signaling more efficient use of shareholder funds. 4. Signaling Management Confidence: A substantial buyback program, like the BitMine share buyback , sends a strong signal that the company‚Äôs management believes its stock is undervalued and that it has strong future prospects. This vote of confidence can reassure existing shareholders and attract new ones. 5. Tax Efficiency for Shareholders: Unlike dividends, which are taxable income in the year they are received, the capital gains from a rising stock price due to a buyback are only taxed when the shares are sold. This can be a more tax-efficient way for companies to return value to shareholders. These potential benefits highlight why a BitMine share buyback could be a positive catalyst for its stock performance and investor sentiment. Are There Any Risks? Navigating Potential Challenges While a BitMine share buyback offers numerous advantages, it‚Äôs also important for investors to consider potential challenges and risks. No financial strategy is without its downsides, and understanding these can provide a more balanced perspective. 1. Opportunity Cost: The $1 billion allocated for the buyback could have been used for other purposes, such as investing in new technologies, expanding mining operations, acquiring other companies, or increasing research and development. If these alternative investments could have generated a higher return, the buyback might represent a missed opportunity for greater long-term growth. 2. Market Volatility and Timing: Executing a large buyback in a volatile market, especially one tied to cryptocurrency assets, carries risks. If the company buys back shares at a high price, and the stock subsequently declines, it could be seen as an inefficient use of capital. The timing of the BitMine share buyback will be crucial in determining its ultimate success. 3. Reduced Liquidity for Future Needs: While BitMine has substantial cash and crypto holdings, deploying a significant portion for a buyback reduces the immediate liquidity available for unforeseen circumstances or future strategic investments. This could potentially limit the company‚Äôs flexibility if market conditions change drastically or new opportunities arise. 4. Misinterpretation of Financial Health: While buybacks often signal confidence, some critics argue that companies use them to artificially inflate EPS without genuine improvements in operational performance. Investors should look beyond just the buyback and assess BitMine‚Äôs underlying business fundamentals and profitability. 5. Impact of Crypto Price Fluctuations: While BitMine‚Äôs ETH and BTC holdings provide a strong asset base, their highly volatile nature means their value can fluctuate significantly. While the buyback is funded by cash, the overall financial health and future strategic options of BitMine are still closely tied to the performance of these digital assets. A comprehensive view of the BitMine share buyback requires acknowledging these potential challenges alongside the benefits. The Crypto Edge: How BitMine‚Äôs ETH and BTC Holdings Shape the Strategy One of the most distinctive aspects of the BitMine share buyback announcement is the explicit mention of its significant cryptocurrency holdings: 625,000 ETH and 192 BTC . This isn‚Äôt just a detail; it‚Äôs a fundamental part of BitMine‚Äôs identity and financial strength, influencing how the market perceives its strategic decisions. How do these crypto assets play into the buyback strategy? Underlying Asset Strength: While the $1 billion share buyback is directly funded by BitMine‚Äôs cash reserves, the substantial crypto holdings provide a robust underlying asset base. These digital assets represent the fruits of their core business ‚Äì crypto mining ‚Äì and their continued value underscores the company‚Äôs operational success in this niche. Future Liquidity Potential: Although not directly used for this buyback, the ETH and BTC holdings represent a significant pool of potential liquidity for future strategic initiatives. In a highly dynamic market, having such liquid, albeit volatile, assets provides flexibility. Market Confidence and Differentiation: For investors interested in the crypto space, BitMine‚Äôs explicit mention of its crypto holdings provides transparency and reinforces its position as a serious player in the digital asset economy. It differentiates BitMine from traditional companies engaging in buybacks, highlighting its unique exposure and expertise in the blockchain sector. Leveraging Market Cycles: A company with substantial crypto holdings might be strategically positioned to leverage market cycles. While crypto values fluctuate, holding these assets allows BitMine to benefit from potential bull runs, further bolstering its balance sheet and providing options for future capital deployment. The presence of these digital assets paints a clearer picture of BitMine‚Äôs financial ecosystem, emphasizing that the BitMine share buyback is not just a traditional corporate finance move, but one uniquely tailored to a company thriving at the intersection of technology and digital currencies. Looking Ahead: The Future Impact of the BitMine Share Buyback The approval of the $1 billion BitMine share buyback is set to reshape investor perception and potentially the company‚Äôs trajectory in the coming months and years. This move could signal a new phase for BitMine Immersion Technologies, focusing on returning value to shareholders and consolidating its market position. Key areas to observe include: Stock Performance: Will the reduced share count translate into sustained upward momentum for BitMine‚Äôs stock? The market‚Äôs reaction will be a crucial indicator of investor confidence in the company‚Äôs strategy. Capital Allocation Strategy: How will BitMine balance future capital allocation between continued buybacks, operational expansion, and potential new investments in the evolving crypto landscape? Market Leadership: By demonstrating financial strength and a clear commitment to shareholder value, BitMine could solidify its position as a leader among publicly traded crypto-centric companies. The long-term success of this BitMine share buyback will depend on its execution, broader market conditions, and BitMine‚Äôs continued operational efficiency in the highly competitive crypto mining industry. Conclusion: A Bold Step in a Dynamic Market BitMine Immersion Technologies‚Äô decision to launch a $1 billion share buyback program is undoubtedly a bold and strategic move. It leverages the company‚Äôs robust cash reserves and significant cryptocurrency holdings to enhance shareholder value and signal strong confidence in its future. While the potential benefits, such as increased EPS and stock price appreciation, are compelling, investors should also remain mindful of the inherent risks and opportunity costs associated with such a large-scale financial maneuver. This development underscores the growing maturity of the crypto industry, where companies like BitMine are increasingly employing sophisticated financial strategies to optimize their capital structure and reward their investors. As the program unfolds, the market will be keenly watching to see how this significant investment in itself translates into sustained growth and value creation for BitMine and its stakeholders. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is the primary purpose of BitMine‚Äôs $1 billion share buyback? The primary purpose of the BitMine share buyback is to return capital to shareholders, increase earnings per share (EPS) by reducing the number of outstanding shares, and signal management‚Äôs confidence in the company‚Äôs current valuation and future prospects. It aims to enhance overall shareholder value. Q2: How is BitMine funding this massive share repurchase program? BitMine Immersion Technologies is funding the $1 billion share buyback program primarily from its existing cash reserves, which currently stand at a substantial $401 million . While its large holdings of ETH and BTC are significant assets, the immediate funding comes from cash. Q3: What role do BitMine‚Äôs cryptocurrency holdings play in this decision? BitMine‚Äôs holdings of 625,000 ETH and 192 BTC are crucial as they represent a significant underlying asset base and a testament to the company‚Äôs core business strength in crypto mining. While not directly funding the buyback, these assets provide financial flexibility, potential future liquidity, and reinforce market confidence in BitMine‚Äôs unique position in the digital asset economy. Q4: What are the potential benefits for investors from this BitMine share buyback? Investors could potentially benefit from an increase in BitMine‚Äôs share price due to reduced supply, higher earnings per share (EPS), and improved financial ratios. The buyback also signals strong management confidence, which can positively influence investor sentiment and attract new capital. Q5: Are there any risks associated with BitMine‚Äôs stock repurchase program? Yes, potential risks include opportunity cost (funds not used for other growth initiatives), the risk of buying back shares at an unfavorable price if the stock declines, and reduced liquidity for future unforeseen needs. Investors should also consider the inherent volatility of the crypto market, which can indirectly impact BitMine‚Äôs overall financial health. Did you find this article insightful? Share it with your network on social media to help others understand the implications of BitMine‚Äôs strategic $1 billion share buyback and its impact on the crypto and traditional financial markets! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin and Ethereum institutional adoption. This post BitMine‚Äôs Bold $1 Billion Share Buyback: A Strategic Move for Crypto Holders first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Shiba Inu Burn Rate Skyrockets by Almost 17,000%, Will SHIB‚Äôs Price React?
body: TL;DR Over 600 million SHIB were burned in a single day. The total amount of the destroyed tokens since adopting the program stands at around 410.7 trillion. Analysts believe Shiba Inu could chart substantial gains if it overcomes certain resistance levels. On the other hand, rising exchange inflows hint at increased selling pressure. The Impressive Burn The second-largest meme coin saw its burn rate increase by a whopping 16,710% in the past 24 hours, resulting in over 602 million tokens being sent to a dead wallet. Interestingly, a single transaction comprised almost 100% of that amount. While the USD equivalent of the destroyed stash is just $8,000, continuous efforts in that field can have a positive impact on Shiba Inu‚Äôs price. After all, fundamental principles of economics dictate that the price should go up in the event of declining supply and rising or constant demand. –¢he burning mechanism was adopted in 2021, and since then, the team and the community have scorched roughly 410.7 trillion tokens, or around 41% of the initial one quadrillion supply. SHIB Supply, Source: Shibburn.com Some members of the crypto community are optimistic that the meme coin could chart gains in the near future . X user CW envisioned ‚Äúa big upside‚Äù if the price breaks the sell wall of $0.000017. Currently, SHIB trades at around $0.0000133, meaning it has to climb by 27% to reach the depicted level. Javon Marks and Friedrich are also among the bulls. The former recently spotted the formation of a large Inverse Head & Shoulders pattern on Shiba Inu‚Äôs price chart, which resembles ‚Äúnotable strength.‚Äù The analyst assumed this might propel a rally to the technical target of $0.000081. Friedrich believes SHIB could follow the positive performance of ETH and retest its all-time high levels. At the same time, he warned investors to pay attention when using leverage. $SHIB is about to blast! With $ETH ripping, $SHIB will go for a retest of ATHs for sure. Bidding in spot! About leverage, manage your risks accordingly. @ShibainuCoin #meme pic.twitter.com/K101EUZ3WK ‚Äî Friedrich (@FriedrichBtc) July 21, 2025 The Bearish Factor Contrary to the optimism expressed by some analysts, Shiba Inu‚Äôs exchange netflow suggests the price may continue to struggle in the short term. CryptoQuant‚Äôs data shows that inflows have surpassed outflows over the past seven days, hinting at a shift from self-custody methods to centralized platforms. This , in turn, increases the immediate selling pressure. SHIB Exchange Netflow, Source: CryptoQuant The post Shiba Inu Burn Rate Skyrockets by Almost 17,000%, Will SHIB‚Äôs Price React? appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Why Is Crypto Down Today? ‚Äì July 29, 2025
body: In a complete reversal from yesterday, the crypto market is down today, with 98 of the top 100 coins per market turning red. The cryptocurrency market capitalization has dropped by another 5.5% over the past 24 hours and below $4 trillion, now standing at $3.97 trillion. At the same time, the total crypto trading volume is at $172 billion. TLDR: Crypto market cap dropped below $4 trillion; 98 of the top 100 coins are down, as are 9 out of the top 10 coins; BTC trades at $118,808 and ETH at $3,807; BTC is expected to be more volatile over the next 90 days; Chances of ETH hitting $4,500 by 29 August surged to 45%; XRP is regaining momentum; US ETH spot ETFs hit the 17th inflow day in a row with $65.14 million; US BTC spot ETFs recorded positive flows of $157.03 million; ‚ÄôBTC is being accumulated on both sides, the dip and higher levels‚Äô; ‚ÄôThe market‚Äôs been flashing signs of overheating‚Äô; Market sentiment indicates rising caution. Crypto Winners & Losers By the time of writing, all but one top 10 coin per market capitalization have dropped over the past 24 hours. Bitcoin (BTC) decreased by 0.6% in a day, now trading at $118,808. This is the smallest drop on this list today. At the same time, Ethereum (ETH) is down by 3.1% and is now trading at $3,807. Dogecoin (DOGE) fell the most. It‚Äôs down 7.7% to the price of $0.2282. Tron (TRX) is the only coin in the category that increased today: 2.3% to $0.3294. As for the top 100 coins, two coins are up. Besides Tron, Conflux (CFX) increased by 27.9% to $0.2457. On the other hand, Sky (SKY) fell the most. It has decreased by 10.2% to $0.08978. Jupiter (JUP) is next, having dropped 9.4% to $0.5592. This will be a very busy week in the US specifically, with a number of earnings and economic news set to hit the markets, including crypto. This includes additional trade and tariff deals, additional earnings reports from tech companies, second-quarter GDP data, the July jobs report, and the Federal Reserve interest rate decision. ‚ÄòBTC is Expected to be More Volatile Over the Next 90 Days‚Äô Sean Dawson, Head of Research at onchain options platform Derive.xyz , said that prices have been largely stable across the board in the past 24 hours. ‚ÄúBTC is expected to be more volatile over the next 90 days than the next 30. Meanwhile, ETH was predicted to have lower short-term volatility earlier this month, but this has since reversed,‚Äù Dawson writes. Source: Derive.xyz, Amberdata BTC‚Äôs 30-day ATM volatility has dropped to its lowest level in two weeks, now sitting at 36%, down from a peak of 40%. ‚ÄúBTC‚Äôs 30-day ATM volatility has dropped to its lowest level in the last fortnight, now sitting at 36%, down from a peak of 40%,‚Äù he says. Additionally, BTC‚Äôs chances of reaching $150,000 by August have stagnated over the past week, currently standing just below 20%. But the chances of ETH hitting $4,500 by 29 August jumped to 45% from 5% at the start of July. ‚ÄúSince May, ETH has been on an absolute tear relative to BTC. The ETH/BTC ratio has almost doubled from 0.018 BTC per ETH to 0.0325,‚Äù Dawson says. ‚ÄúThe rise of ETH treasury companies like Bitmine and Ethermachine signals growing institutional alignment and could mark the start of a new alt season heading into Q3 2025.‚Äù Furthermore, blockchain data platform Glassnode found on Monday that BTC‚Äôs $117,000 level was still attracting demand. ‚ÄúThe $110,000‚Äì$117,000 range is gradually filling in. BTC is being accumulated on both sides ‚Äì buyers stepping in on dips, while earlier buyers are now acquiring at higher levels,‚Äù they also wrote . $BTC options skew shows an unusual divergence: 1M puts trade at a premium (+4.6%), while 1W skew lags. This suggests near-term bullish sentiment, with traders using 1W calls, while 1M downside protection signals hedging or profit-taking on the rally. pic.twitter.com/QwJyWSdWXm ‚Äî glassnode (@glassnode) July 28, 2025 Meanwhile, Tom Bruni, VP of Community and Editor-in-Chief at Stocktwits , commented that ‚Äúthe market‚Äôs been flashing signs of overheating, with meme stocks and altcoins taking the spotlight.‚Äù However, ‚Äúdespite all the noise,‚Äù Bruni says, major indexes barely moved, while international stocks remained range-bound. If risk assets, including Bitcoin, drop even after ‚Äúpositive‚Äù tariff news, ‚Äúthat could be a warning sign that this run is losing steam.‚Äù XRP is Regaining Momentum Moreover, James Toledano, Chief Operating Officer at Unity Wallet , commented on XRP‚Äôs recent price performance. ‚ÄúThe waters are a little choppy where XRP is concerned because the price is low compared to Bitcoin, so the price swings, although seemingly small, are big in percentage terms.‚Äù The price is down 9% in a week, and it‚Äôs up 44% in a month and 420% in a year. Despite the weekly drop, ‚Äúthe general feeling is optimistic,‚Äù Toledano says. The coin is regaining momentum as exchange-traded fund (ETF) optimism and legal clarity ‚Äúconverge, pushing it briefly above $3.6 before correcting.‚Äù Futures products like ProShares‚Äô UXRP are ‚Äúfueling speculation about a potential spot ETF becoming a reality.‚Äù Also, XRP saw stronger institutional confidence since Ripple‚Äôs ‚Äúpartial legal win‚Äù in March With the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) ‚Äúmaintaining a softened posture, many see a structural step forward for XRP‚Äôs legitimacy in U.S. markets,‚Äù Toledano writes. ‚ÄúDespite recent volatility and $105‚ÄØmillion in liquidations, improving liquidity, growing institutional flows, and ETF-driven optimism are aligning, making a continued rally plausible if inflows and optimism continue to converge.‚Äù Levels & Events to Watch Next At the time of writing, BTC trades at $118,976. Despite the minor drop today, the price recuperated quickly from the intraday low of $117,948. It peaked at $119,468 and has continued trading between $117,000 $119,000. These are strong indications of what to observe: whether the price will be pushed below the $117,000 level, in which case it may return to $115,000, possibly lower. On the other hand, climbing above $119,000 could lead to $122,000, and subsequently a new ATH. Bitcoin Price Chart. Source: TradingView Moreover, Ethereum is currently trading at $3,886. This is a decrease from the daily high of $3,919. Nonetheless, the price is evidently moving to the much-anticipated $4,000 mark. Many analysts argue that it‚Äôs bound to hit it very soon. How long it will hold it is another story. Furthermore, the crypto market sentiment has dropped towards the neutral zone, nearly entering it. The crypto fear and greed index now stands at 63 today , compared to 67 yesterday, signaling growing caution among investors. That said, there is still optimism in the market, and this level can generally be seen as healthy. Meanwhile, on Monday, the US BTC spot exchange-traded funds (ETFs) saw inflows of $157.03 million . The cumulative net inflow stands at $54.98 billion as of 28 July. BlackRock leads this list with $147.36 million in inflows. Fidelity and Grayscale also saw positive flows, while Bitwise and Ark&21 Shares recorded outflows. At the same time, the US ETH ETFs recorded the 17 th consecutive day of positive flows with $65.14 million on Monday. The surge in price continues to fuel institutional interest. The cumulative net inflow is now $9.4 billion. Of the Monday‚Äôs amount, BlackRock took in $131.95 million. On the other hand, Grayscale and Fidelity noted outflows. As mentioned above, investors are keeping an eye on earnings and economic news coming from the US, specifically trade and tariff deals, tech companies‚Äô earnings, Q2 GDP data, the July jobs report, and the Federal Reserve interest rate. Meanwhile, ARK Invest named SOL Strategies as its new Solana staking provider. ‚ÄúBeing selected as ARK‚Äôs Solana staking provider represents significant validation of our institutional infrastructure and market position,‚Äù said Leah Wald, CEO of SOL Strategies. Our BitGo integration was key to making this relationship possible. When the world's leading institutional custody platform trusts your validators, and ARK chooses your infrastructure‚Ä¶ That's how you know you're building the right foundation for the future of finance. ‚Äî SOL Strategies (@solstrategies_) July 28, 2025 Also, Mill City Ventures III , a Nasdaq -listed non-bank lender, raised $450 million in a private placement to establish a crypto treasury centered on Sui . Galaxy Asset Management will manage the new treasury. Galaxy is investing and managing the treasury for Mill City Ventures III, Ltd., following a $450M private placement to initiate a $SUI treasury strategy. Backed by a broad group of institutional investors, including the @SuiFoundation , @Karatage_ , and others. Galaxy Asset‚Ä¶ ‚Äî Galaxy (@galaxyhq) July 28, 2025 Also, Tron , a Nasdaq-listed company formerly known for selling theme park souvenirs, filed to register up to $1 billion in securities , aiming to build a crypto treasury centered on TRX . Quick FAQ Why did crypto move against stocks today? The crypto market decreased over the last 24 hours, and the stock market closed with a mixed performance on Monday. For example, the S&P 500 was up by 0.018%, the Nasdaq-100 increased by 0.36%, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average fell by 0.14%. The stock market is awaiting a flurry of news related to trade deals, tech company earnings reports, and several key economic data and decisions. Is this dip sustainable? This is likely a typical market pullback, and the prices will still go up. That said, incoming news from the US, including trade deals, tariffs, inflation, and the interest rate, will affect the market. It remains to be seen in what way. The post Why Is Crypto Down Today? ‚Äì July 29, 2025 appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: The ‚ÄúMoney Printing‚Äù Glitch That Turned a NYC Youth Program Into a $17M ATM Free-for-All
body: $17M stolen from NYC youth job program via ATM cards in a TikTok-driven fraud scheme. ATM networks‚Äô outdated systems exposed security gaps exploited during SYEP card breach. Financial institutions urged to improve ATM devices after widespread exploit. A multi-million-dollar ATM withdrawal fraud linked to New York City‚Äôs Summer Youth Employment Program (SYEP) has raised urgent concerns about the security of public benefit systems. According to a New York Times report , approximately $17 million was illicitly withdrawn across the city between July 11 and July 14 using payment cards issued to the program‚Äôs participants. The cards were distributed to around 30,000 unbanked individuals aged 14 to 24 who were enrolled in the city-run summer jobs initiative. While the cards were intended to handle weekly earnings of a few hundred dollars, a malfunction or security failure allegedly allowed access to far larger sums, with some users able to withdraw $10,000 to $40,000 at a time. Related: Nebraska fights for state control of stablecoin rules as Bitcoin ATM fraud sparks national concern Authorities blocked the exploit on the morning of July 14 after ATM oper‚Ä¶ The post The ‚ÄúMoney Printing‚Äù Glitch That Turned a NYC Youth Program Into a $17M ATM Free-for-All appeared first on Coin Edition .

title: Linea to Burn ETH With Every Transaction in Bold L2 Upgrade
body: Linea, an Ethereum layer-2 network incubated by Consensys, has unveiled a comprehensive suite of upgrades designed to embed the network deeper into the layer 1‚Äôs economic and ideological fabric. Linea‚Äôs updated road map, expected to roll out in October 2025, introduces ETH-native staking on bridged assets, a protocol-level ETH burn mechanism, and the allocation of 85% of its token supply to ecosystem development. This move comes as momentum in the Ethereum ecosystem is building, thanks to the growing institutional interest. The Linea team wrote in a press release shared with CoinDesk that their updates will ‚Äúposition Ethereum to meet the needs of sophisticated capital as TradFi begins to onboard to DeFi, and reinforce Linea as a major home of future innovations in on-chain capital markets, staking, and infrastructure.‚Äù The team claims that of the updates, Linea will become the first layer 2 to burn ETH at the protocol level and commit 20% of net transaction fees toward reducing Ethereum supply. The remaining 80% of fees will be used to burn LINEA tokens, which are capped in supply, embedding deflationary pressure directly into network activity. ‚ÄúLinea Mainnet will burn ETH with every transaction, use the LINEA token to support users, builders, and public goods, and return value to Ethereum‚Äôs base layer, all while growing long-term value in the LINEA token-based economy,‚Äù said Declan Fox, Head of Linea, in the press release. According to a spokesperson at Consensys, the LINEA token is not live yet, but will be ‚Äòsoon.‚Äô The network, which launched in 2023, has $159 million locked in the protocol, according to DefiLlama. Linea‚Äôs ETH staking mechanism will allow bridged ETH to generate staking rewards on Ethereum mainnet, adding a native yield component for liquidity providers and DeFi protocols building on the rollup. Linea consortium The move coincides with the formation of the Linea Consortium, which will be a governing body for the protocol‚Äôs ecosystem fund, including members like Eigen Labs, ENS Labs, SharpLink, Status, and Consensys. With a 75% allocation of token supply earmarked for long-term growth initiatives, the consortium will oversee funding for developers, liquidity providers, and public goods across the Ethereum ecosystem. An additional 10% is reserved for early Linea users, while Consensys‚Äô 15% share will be locked for five years. ‚ÄúWe are witnessing an architectural reset in global finance, where credibly neutral, decentralized, programmable infrastructure becomes table stakes for how value, identity, and coordination function across borders and institutions. Ethereum is emerging as the trust foundation for this new economic architecture,‚Äù said Joseph Lubin, the CEO of Consensys, who is also a co-founder of the Ethereum network and the Chairman of SharpLink. ‚ÄúLinea is the only L2 with total Ethereum compatibility, and we wanted the economics to be as aligned and supportive as the technology.‚Äù Read more: Consensys Acquires Web3Auth to Reinvent MetaMask Onboarding

title: Ethereum's Success Won't Translate Into Altcoins
body: Summary Ether‚Äôs recent price gains have market pundits predicting an impending Altcoin Season. Altcoin‚Äôs are ‚Äúoscillators at best‚Äù and two ingredients for their success are missing. Cryptocurrency deregulation will benefit Ethereum more than Bitcoin. The Dencun and Pectra upgrades sharply lowered fees going to the L1 and increased ETH‚Äôs inflation. Ethereum is an institutional-gradeblockchain with several unique bullish factors. Thesis: Investor sentiment for Ethereum ( ETH-USD ) shifted dramatically from depressed and apathetic to enthusiastic. The recent drop in Bitcoin Dominance alongside strong positive momentum for Ethereum has translated to predictions of an Altcoin Season. This makes complete sense given that ETH is the Altcoin market‚Äôs 600lb gorilla. And as the saying goes, ‚Äúso goes ETH, so goes the Altcoin market.‚Äù However, this time is different, as we‚Äôre missing two pieces of the puzzle. This article discusses my Rating Scorecard, trends within Ethereum, why ETH could perform well without an Altcoin Season and how we can get to the ‚Äúbanana zone‚Äù in crypto. Introduction Ethereum ( ETH-USD ) is a distributed blockchain platform for smart contracts and decentralized applications. Ethereum‚Äôs smart contracts have enabled the creation of various new assets and industries such as Decentralized Finance ( DEFI ), NFTs and DAOs (for governance)‚Ä¶Ethereum uses a Proof of Stake (PoS) consensus mechanism where validators secure the network and participate in block production. Ratings Framework Ethereum is rated highly under my Ratings Scorecard which includes 12 factors. In summary, the project rates below-average under Vitalik Buterin‚Äôs Blockchain Trilemma (e.g., Decentralization, Scaleability, Security) as well as User Experience. Vitalik has chosen to focus on Security rather than Scaleability and Decentralization. That being said, management and the Ethereum Foundation are working on alleviating its shortcomings. Ethereum‚Äôs roadmap can be found here . Ethereum rates well for Ecosystem Development, Funding, Developers, (new) Management team, Roadmap, Use-Case, Tokenomics and Social Engagement. Ethereum also benefits from Lindy‚Äôs Law as it‚Äôs been around for a decade and has been copied, forked and battle-tested. Ethereum‚Äôs been said to work in an ‚ÄúIvory Tower‚Äù away from the real world as Vitalik philosophizes about blockchain. Developers of Dapps have complained that Ethereum doesn‚Äôt reach out to them or ‚Äúreturn phone calls‚Äù all of which sapped the excitement out of the chain in favor of sexier projects such as Solana ( SOL-USD ). Again, Ethereum‚Äôs steady, slow and corporate while Solana is entrepreneurial. Prophetizing Ethereum ETH‚Äôs having its most dramatic shift in history as skeptics jump onto the bull bandwagon. Despite being a long-term ETH bull, I have been fairly critical of them on social media (see below). I think their largest mistake was not shifting the narrative to ‚ÄúETH as store of value‚Äù as they executed the ‚ÄúDencun‚Äù and ‚ÄúPectra‚Äù upgrades ‚Äì both of which significantly reduced the amount of fee-revenues going to the L1. This effectively lowers intrinsic value using the DCF valuation method, making Ethereum appear overvalued relative to its current market cap. Author's creation, LinkedIn The chart below shows how Ethereum‚Äôs inflation rate initially declined post-Merge‚Äù (move to proof-of-stake) but inevitably rose to 0.8%/year due to its upgrades. Ultrasound Money The Ethereum Foundation‚Äôs change in focus has given investors hope. This is best evangelized by Etherealize ‚Äì their bull case is summarized in the table below. (Note: just to be clear, I don‚Äôt ‚Äúbuy‚Äù all of their bullish factors ‚Äì several of which repeat themselves. On the rightmost column, I marked the ones that are uniquely bullish factors to Ethereum as ‚ÄúYes‚Äù, as the others are common in other layer 1 chains.) Author's creation, Etherealize data The Comeback Kid This term refers to someone who bounces back from hardship to achieve success again. The term often highlights resilience and the ability to persevere through challenging circumstances. Ok, maybe I‚Äôm stretching this a little bit, but in some ways Ethereum is the comeback kid. Yes, it didn‚Äôt go through a near-death experience like Solana, but Ethereum had a turnaround nonetheless. Recent changes in leadership at the Ethereum Foundation and a strategic focus on the layer 1‚Äôs scalability and U/X should result in a new lease on life. If you recall, Ethereum gave up on internal sharding and instead moved to dozens of L2s ‚Äì all of which have different U/X‚Äôs. The Pectra upgrade resolves this issue via Account Abstraction ( EIP-7702) that: Improves U/X and user-experience Simplifies the development of Dapps And enhances security by providing multi-factor and other recovery options Recently Coinbase‚Äôs ( COIN ) Base-chain introduced a rebranded Base App that is a super-App platform (apps, one-tap payments, trading, social-media‚Ä¶) that ‚Äúabstracts-away‚Äù all the friction points that have been hindering non-tech users from joining Web3. Ether as Digital Oil I would like to expand on factors from the above table that are mostly unique to Ethereum. Qualitatively, I believe Ethereum will be successful as cryptocurrency deregulation pivots the market to professional money managers and institutions such as banks. There are three bills which favor Ethereum: the Genius Bill (signed by Trump) for stablecoins, the Anti-CBDC Act and the CLARITY ACT. I expect the latter two will be signed into law by year-end. Institutions favor Ethereum for many reasons, some of which mirror themselves, meaning they‚Äôre comfortable working with technologies that are well-established and battle-tested. Asset managers also like the fact that Ethereum pays ‚Äúdividends‚Äù in the form of staking returns (~ 3% yield ). Since Ether is a store of value and battle-tested, institutions prefer tokenizing assets on its platform without worrying if it‚Äôll be around years from now or whether it‚Äôll have high inflation. One concrete example showing that institutions are indeed interested in Ethereum is the volume of ETH CFDs. These are institutional derivative contracts for the difference between the opening and closing price of ETH. ETH‚Äôs market share of volume surged from 6.6% in FY‚Äô24 to 13.6% as of 1H‚Äô25. Wintermute About 55% of all tokenized assets (includes Stablecoins) are on Ethereum and this will rise quickly now that Genius has been signed into law. Further, if you include the Ethereum ecosystem (L2s, rollups) that percentage rises to over 75% (league table below). RWA.xyz ETH as a Strategic Reserve Asset Now that I‚Äôve presented all the attributes that make Ethereum (the blockchain network) and ETH the native currency so revered to institutions, it makes sense that they would want to stockpile it into a treasury reserve as has been done with Bitcoin. Sharplink‚Äôs ( SBET ) Joe Lubin is to ETH in what MicroStrategy‚Äôs ( MSTR ) Michael Saylor is to BTC. You can think of ETH treasuries as Bitcoin with extra bells & whistles as the treasuries will be gathering Defi returns. The table below shows the largest treasuries and The Ether Machine recently joined with a stated goal of having $1.5Bn in ETH. Strategic.ETH.Reserve.xyz Some asset managers (especially smaller managers) have chosen to participate in ETH ‚Äúownership‚Äù by purchasing spot ETFs that custody Ether. The recent trend in ETF flows towards Ethereum rather than Bitcoin is the largest I‚Äôve seen since ETH ETFs were first approved last year. In the table below, notice the percentage of Ethereum flows has sharply increased this year. For example, they rose from 38% of Bitcoin‚Äôs flow YTD to 89% MTD. CoinShares Is ETH‚Äôs 60% bull run a harbinger of Altcoin Season ? I believe the recent runup in ETH‚Äôs price is Ethereum normalizing back to its place as digital Silver as Bitcoin is to Gold. In my previous articles over the last year, I stated that we probably won‚Äôt have Altcoin Season until at least May‚Äô25 and by ‚ÄúBy George‚Äù that‚Äôs exactly when ETH started mooning. However, the reasons why I said ‚Äúwait till May‚Äù was that I assumed that a) the U.S. and or global economies would slow and b) that the Fed would begin Quantitative Easing and this will show itself by accelerating M2 growth (chart below). Neither has happened, albeit M2 growth has risen from 6% during my last article to 8% (tipping point ?). The U.S. Unemployment Rate remains at a low 4.1% (June 2025) despite ‚Äúsoft data‚Äù remaining lackluster. Consequently, I think Altcoins are Oscillators at best, but more likely they‚Äôre Call Options that steadily decline towards zero. Remember, low entry-barriers have allowed for the number of created cryptocurrencies to rise from 20,000 (previous Altcoin Season) to a whopping 18.88 million. That‚Äôs a lot of supply ! CoinMarketCap BGeometrics Speculation is getting Rampant My proprietary Indicators of Risk within financial markets show we‚Äôre near a local top and near peak speculation (though not as high as 2021). I am seeing confluence with other markets including crypto. As you can see in the charts below, crypto is also near peak speculation. The charts show just how excessive this speculation is. The first chart shows that Perpetual Futures Premiums on Altcoins are quite high (meaning there‚Äôs high demand for leveraged long exposure ) and tend to peak near local tops. The second chart shows that Whales holding Bitcoin are transferring coins to exchanges, which is typically done when they‚Äôre preparing to sell them. (Remember: Altcoins are tied to the hip of Bitcoin.) GlassNode GlassNode So then why am so Bullish on ETH ? I think ETH and especially Altcoins, could have a correction during the near-term as we wait for the Fed to add liquidity. However, I remain bullish (Rated ‚Äú Strong Buy ‚Äù) for my 10 year time horizon. There‚Äôs considerable resistance at the $4000-plus level on the chart, and according to Glassnode, it‚Äôll be excessively difficult getting past $4,500, as this level represents one standard deviation of Ethereum‚Äôs active realized price. I leave you with a quote from Kevin Li (@ Artemis): ‚ÄúETH isn‚Äôt just like a Cloud software company or a simple Utility token for transaction fees. Rather, it represents a scarce, programmable, and economically essential reserve asset‚Äîone that underpins the security, settlement, and functionality of a progressively institutionalized on-chain financial ecosystem.‚Äù GlassNode
