title: Coinbase BankrCoin: Historic Listing Unlocks New Opportunities on Base Network
body: BitcoinWorld Coinbase BankrCoin: Historic Listing Unlocks New Opportunities on Base Network The crypto world is abuzz with the latest news: Coinbase BankrCoin support is officially coming to the Base network! This pivotal announcement from one of the world‚Äôs leading cryptocurrency exchanges is set to open new avenues for traders and significantly boost the visibility of BankrCoin (BNKR). For anyone tracking the pulse of digital assets, this development signals a moment of considerable interest, promising increased liquidity and accessibility for BNKR. Coinbase‚Äôs decision to list a new asset is always a significant event, often leading to substantial market movements and increased investor attention. When such a listing occurs on an emerging, high-potential network like Base, the implications are even more profound. This article delves into the details of this exciting development, exploring its potential impact on traders, the broader Base ecosystem, and the future trajectory of BankrCoin. What Does Coinbase BankrCoin Support on Base Network Truly Signify? The core of this exciting news revolves around Coinbase‚Äôs formal announcement via X (formerly Twitter) regarding its support for BankrCoin (BNKR) on the Base network. This isn‚Äôt just another routine listing; it represents a strategic alignment between a major exchange, a burgeoning Layer 2 blockchain, and a specific digital asset. The key details are precise and crucial for anyone looking to engage with BNKR: Asset in Focus: BankrCoin (BNKR) Network Integration: Base network Trading Commencement: On or after 9 a.m. (PT) on July 30 Prerequisite: Trading will only begin once sufficient liquidity conditions are met. This liquidity requirement is standard practice for new listings and underscores Coinbase‚Äôs commitment to ensuring a stable and fair trading environment. For traders, this means closely monitoring market conditions leading up to the launch. The support for Coinbase BankrCoin on Base is a clear signal of confidence in both the asset and the underlying network‚Äôs capabilities. Why is the Base Network Important for Coinbase BankrCoin ? Base is an Ethereum Layer 2 (L2) blockchain incubated by Coinbase. Its primary goal is to provide a secure, low-cost, developer-friendly environment for building decentralized applications (dApps). By integrating BNKR on Base, Coinbase is not just listing a coin; it‚Äôs endorsing a specific technological pathway. Here‚Äôs why Base‚Äôs role is critical: Scalability: Base offers significantly higher transaction throughput and lower fees compared to the Ethereum mainnet, making micro-transactions and frequent trading more viable for Coinbase BankrCoin . Security: As an L2 built on Ethereum, Base inherits Ethereum‚Äôs robust security features, providing a reliable foundation for asset transfers and smart contract execution. Ecosystem Growth: Listing on Base exposes BankrCoin to a rapidly expanding ecosystem of dApps, users, and developers who are increasingly active on Coinbase‚Äôs incubated network. This symbiotic relationship between Coinbase, Base, and BankrCoin suggests a strategic move to foster growth within Coinbase‚Äôs own blockchain initiatives while expanding the utility and reach of selected assets. Diving Deeper: Why is Coinbase Listing BankrCoin on the Base Network a Game-Changer? Coinbase‚Äôs decision to list any cryptocurrency is a significant event in the crypto world. It often acts as a stamp of legitimacy and greatly enhances an asset‚Äôs market presence. When considering the Coinbase BankrCoin listing on Base, several factors elevate this announcement beyond a typical new addition: The Coinbase Effect: A Gateway to Millions Coinbase boasts millions of users globally, ranging from retail investors to institutional players. A listing on this platform means immediate exposure to a vast, diverse, and often liquidity-rich user base. For BankrCoin, this translates into: Increased Liquidity: More traders mean higher trading volumes and deeper liquidity pools, making it easier to buy and sell BNKR without significant price slippage. Enhanced Credibility: Coinbase‚Äôs rigorous listing process and regulatory compliance lend a strong sense of credibility to listed assets. This can attract more conservative investors who might otherwise shy away from newer or less-established tokens. Wider Accessibility: Coinbase‚Äôs user-friendly interface and robust infrastructure make it simple for new users to access and trade BNKR, lowering the barrier to entry. The Base Network Advantage: A Strategic Home for Coinbase BankrCoin The choice of the Base network for the Coinbase BankrCoin listing is not arbitrary. It highlights Coinbase‚Äôs long-term vision for its L2 ecosystem and its commitment to fostering innovation within it. This strategic placement offers several advantages: Feature Benefit for BankrCoin on Base Low Transaction Costs Encourages more frequent trading and micro-transactions, increasing BNKR utility. Faster Confirmations Improves user experience and enables quicker arbitrage opportunities. Coinbase Integration Seamless bridging from Coinbase main platform to Base, reducing friction for users. Developer-Friendly Environment Potential for more dApps and integrations built around BNKR on Base. This combination creates a powerful synergy, positioning Coinbase BankrCoin for robust growth within a secure and efficient environment. Unlocking Potential: How Can Traders Capitalize on the Coinbase BankrCoin Listing? For active traders and long-term investors alike, the Coinbase BankrCoin listing presents a spectrum of opportunities. Understanding how to approach this event is key to potentially maximizing gains while managing risks. Potential Benefits for Traders: Price Discovery: New listings on major exchanges often lead to significant price volatility and discovery as the market absorbs the new supply and demand dynamics. Early participants might see substantial gains. Arbitrage Opportunities: If BNKR is already trading on other exchanges, price discrepancies might emerge between Coinbase and other platforms, creating arbitrage opportunities. Increased Trading Volume: The influx of new traders from Coinbase is likely to boost BNKR‚Äôs trading volume, making it a more liquid and attractive asset for day traders. Ecosystem Participation: Engaging with BNKR on Base could open doors to other dApps and opportunities within the Base ecosystem. Actionable Insights for Navigating the Listing: To prepare for the trading commencement of Coinbase BankrCoin on July 30, consider the following: Monitor Liquidity: Keep a close eye on Coinbase‚Äôs announcements regarding liquidity conditions. Trading will only begin once these are met. Research BankrCoin: Understand BNKR‚Äôs whitepaper, use cases, tokenomics, and development roadmap. A strong fundamental understanding is crucial. Familiarize with Base: If you‚Äôre new to the Base network, understand how to bridge assets to it and navigate its ecosystem. Start Small: Especially during the initial hours or days, consider starting with smaller position sizes to gauge market reaction and volatility. Set Stop-Loss Orders: Given the potential for high volatility, using stop-loss orders can help mitigate downside risk. Navigating the Volatility: What Are the Risks of Trading BankrCoin on Base ? While the Coinbase BankrCoin listing brings immense opportunities, it‚Äôs equally important to acknowledge and prepare for the inherent risks associated with new crypto listings, especially on emerging networks. Responsible trading necessitates a clear understanding of these potential pitfalls. Key Challenges and Risks: High Volatility: New listings are notoriously volatile. Prices can swing wildly in either direction based on speculative trading, initial buy/sell pressure, and market sentiment. Liquidity Risks: While Coinbase aims for sufficient liquidity, initial trading might still be thin, leading to larger price impacts from relatively small orders. Market Manipulation: New listings can sometimes be targets for ‚Äòpump and dump‚Äô schemes. Always be wary of unofficial signals or exaggerated claims. Technical Glitches: High traffic volumes during a new listing can sometimes lead to temporary platform slowdowns or glitches, which could affect trade execution. Uncertain Fundamentals: While Coinbase lists reputable assets, the long-term success of any new crypto like BankrCoin depends on its adoption, development, and real-world utility, which can take time to materialize. Risk Management Strategies: To navigate these challenges, consider implementing robust risk management: Diversify Your Portfolio: Avoid putting all your capital into a single new listing. Define Your Risk Tolerance: Only invest what you can afford to lose. Stay Informed: Follow official announcements from Coinbase and BankrCoin‚Äôs development team. Avoid FOMO: Fear of missing out can lead to irrational decisions. Stick to your trading plan. Beyond the Horizon: What‚Äôs Next for BankrCoin , Base , and the Future of Crypto Listings? The Coinbase BankrCoin listing on Base is more than just a single event; it‚Äôs a testament to the evolving landscape of the cryptocurrency market. It signifies a growing trend where major exchanges are not just venues for trading but also active participants in fostering specific blockchain ecosystems. Implications for BankrCoin: For BankrCoin itself, this listing is a massive leap forward. It provides the project with unparalleled exposure, potential for increased development funding through heightened market cap, and a clear path to wider adoption. The challenge for the BankrCoin team will be to capitalize on this momentum by continuing to build, innovate, and deliver on their roadmap, thereby sustaining investor interest beyond the initial listing hype. Impact on the Base Ecosystem: This listing further solidifies Base‚Äôs position as a serious contender in the L2 space. By attracting a notable asset like BNKR, Base demonstrates its capability to host diverse projects and facilitate efficient trading. This could pave the way for more projects to consider building on or migrating to Base, leveraging its low costs and Coinbase‚Äôs backing. It enhances Base‚Äôs network effects, making it more attractive for both users and developers. The Future of Crypto Listings: The trend of exchanges supporting assets on their proprietary or incubated networks is likely to continue. This model creates a more integrated and controlled environment, potentially leading to smoother user experiences and better regulatory oversight. It also suggests a future where listings are not just about trading pairs but about fostering entire sub-ecosystems within the broader crypto landscape. The Coinbase BankrCoin move is a blueprint for this integrated approach. Summary: A New Chapter for Coinbase BankrCoin and Base The announcement of Coinbase BankrCoin support on the Base network marks a significant milestone for all parties involved. For BankrCoin, it promises unprecedented exposure and liquidity. For the Base network, it validates its growing importance as a scalable and cost-effective Layer 2 solution. And for traders, it presents fresh opportunities to engage with a new asset on a reputable platform. As we approach July 30, the crypto community will be watching closely to see how this exciting development unfolds, underscoring the dynamic and ever-evolving nature of the digital asset space. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: When will Coinbase start supporting BankrCoin (BNKR) trading on the Base network? A1: Trading for BankrCoin (BNKR) on the Base network is scheduled to commence on or after 9 a.m. (PT) on July 30, provided that sufficient liquidity conditions are met. Q2: What is the Base network, and why is it significant for the Coinbase BankrCoin listing? A2: Base is an Ethereum Layer 2 (L2) blockchain incubated by Coinbase. It offers lower transaction costs and faster confirmations than the Ethereum mainnet. Its significance for the Coinbase BankrCoin listing lies in providing a scalable, secure, and cost-effective environment for BNKR trading, enhancing its accessibility and utility within the broader Coinbase ecosystem. Q3: What are the potential benefits of trading BankrCoin on Coinbase? A3: Key benefits include increased liquidity, enhanced credibility due to Coinbase‚Äôs rigorous listing process, wider accessibility to millions of users, potential for price discovery, and opportunities for arbitrage if BNKR is traded elsewhere. Q4: Are there any risks associated with trading a newly listed asset like Coinbase BankrCoin? A4: Yes, risks include high price volatility, potential liquidity issues during initial trading, susceptibility to market manipulation, and the general uncertainty surrounding the long-term fundamentals of new assets. Traders should exercise caution and employ risk management strategies. Q5: How can traders prepare for the BankrCoin listing on Coinbase? A5: Traders should monitor Coinbase‚Äôs liquidity announcements, thoroughly research BankrCoin‚Äôs fundamentals, familiarize themselves with the Base network, consider starting with smaller position sizes, and utilize risk management tools like stop-loss orders. Q6: What broader impact might this Coinbase BankrCoin listing have on the crypto market? A6: This listing could further validate the Base network as a viable L2 solution, encourage more projects to integrate with Coinbase‚Äôs ecosystem, and reinforce the trend of major exchanges playing a more active role in fostering specific blockchain environments. If you found this article insightful, please consider sharing it with your network on social media. Your support helps us continue to provide timely and comprehensive crypto news and analysis! title: Vincent Mazzotta Admits $13M Crypto Ponzi ‚Äì But Did His Fake ‚ÄòFederal Reserve‚Äô Fool Regulators?
body: Arizona man Vincent Anthony Mazzotta Jr. pleaded guilty to money laundering and conspiracy to obstruct justice on Monday for his role in orchestrating a $13 million crypto Ponzi scheme, a new press release from the Department of Justice (DOJ) states. Arizona man pleads guilty to money laundering charges related to Ponzi scheme that resulted in $13 million in investor losses https://t.co/lYXNDkr7M2 ‚Äî US Attorney L.A. (@USAO_LosAngeles) July 28, 2025 Arizona Man Pleads Guilty in $13M Crypto Fraud According to the July 28 press release , the one-time Los Angeles resident and his co-defendant, David Saffron, fraudulently promised high-yield crypto-trading returns from investments in companies such as Mind Capital and Cloud9Capital, among others. The duo even went so far as to create an organization called the Federal Crypto Reserve (FCR), a fake entity that solicited thousands of dollars from victims of the scam under the guise of ‚Äúinvestigating‚Äù the crypto companies involved in the scheme . Between FCR and the other fraudulent crypto investments, Saffron and Mazzotta defrauded victims out of $13 million. ‚ÄúVincent Mazzotta defrauded investors in a sophisticated cryptocurrency scheme and then doubled down by using a fake government entity to further victimize those who had entrusted him with their money,‚Äù said Acting Assistant Attorney General Matthew R. Galeotti of the Justice Department‚Äôs Criminal Division. ‚ÄúCombating fraud in digital assets is critical to the Criminal Division‚Äôs efforts to vindicate victims‚Äô interests and to keep bad actors out of the crypto markets,‚Äù he added. Co-Conspirators Tried to Destroy Evidence After Arrest Following Saffron‚Äôs arrest, Mazzotta and several other unnamed co-conspirators attempted to ‚Äúconceal and destroy evidence‚Äù stemming from the crime, including an iPad and items in a personal safe. ‚ÄúMazzotta also conspired to falsify the records of his business, Runway Beauty Inc., to conceal his involvement in the investment fraud scheme from a federal grand jury,‚Äù the press release states. Mazzotta, who is slated to be sentenced on December 15, is facing up to a total of 15 years behind bars for the digital asset scam . The post Vincent Mazzotta Admits $13M Crypto Ponzi ‚Äì But Did His Fake ‚ÄòFederal Reserve‚Äô Fool Regulators? appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Bio Protocol price forecast after Coinbase added BIO and EUL to listing roadmap
body: The price of Bio Protocol (BIO) has surged recently following Coinbase‚Äôs decision to add the token, along with Euler (EUL), to its asset listing roadmap. This move by the top-tier US exchange triggered strong market interest, pushing BIO into bullish territory with sharp upward momentum and renewed investor attention. Coinbase announced on July 29 via X (formerly Twitter), indicating that both BIO and EUL are now under consideration for future listing on its platform. While a listing is not guaranteed, such roadmap additions often spark increased buying pressure ‚Äî a phenomenon widely known as the ‚ÄúCoinbase effect.‚Äù Bio Protocol price reacted swiftly to the roadmap addition Immediately after Coinbase‚Äôs announcement, BIO jumped from $0.0612 to $0.07916, representing a nearly 30% surge. Although it later pared some gains, the token remained up by about 17% at the time of reporting. EUL also experienced an initial 22% price spike but soon retraced, settling with a more modest 3.5% gain. Notably, the surge in BIO‚Äôs price is consistent with past reactions to Coinbase roadmap news. Investors typically view such developments as a signal of legitimacy, especially when they involve tokens that are already trading on other reputable exchanges. In BIO‚Äôs case, the token is already listed on Binance, OKX, Kraken, KuCoin, and others, which has helped provide liquidity and limit downside volatility. The bullish trend is supported by a strong technical setup From a technical standpoint, BIO has shown signs of a bullish reversal pattern. A rounded bottom formation emerged recently, often interpreted as a precursor to trend shifts. Bio Protocol price chart | Source: TradingView After a prolonged downturn, the token has begun climbing steadily, breaking above critical resistance levels and forming higher lows. Currently, the Bio Protocol price is consolidating around the $0.0690 zone following an aggressive liquidity sweep above $0.0750. This move likely triggered stop orders and absorbed selling pressure before the price dipped slightly. However, buyers appear to be holding the $0.0690 support level, which keeps the bullish structure intact on the 1-hour chart. If the uptrend resumes, the next resistance targets sit at $0.0940, $0.1258, and $0.1660. These levels are widely watched by traders, and a break above each could invite further momentum. Based on current positioning, analysts estimate a potential 136% upside from current levels if the bullish structure continues to hold. Risk of downside if support fails Despite the optimistic outlook, the short-term technical picture comes with caution. If the $0.0690 support breaks down, the Bio Protocol price could decline toward the next demand zone around $0.0630. Such a move would still maintain the overall bullish trend, as long as the ascending trendline on the hourly chart remains intact. Market sentiment will also play a role in determining whether buyers re-enter at these lower levels. Given the volatility of small-cap altcoins, traders should closely monitor Bio Protocol‚Äôs price action and be aware of fakeouts like the one seen near $0.0750. A second rejection at that level without new volume inflows could invite short-term selling pressure. The post Bio Protocol price forecast after Coinbase added BIO and EUL to listing roadmap appeared first on Invezz

title: Zuckerberg‚Äôs AI push has fueled rising costs but lags in short-term returns
body: Meta Platforms‚Äô hefty AI spending comes into focus as CEO Mark Zuckerberg‚Äôs huge ambitions to win in the AI arms race are seemingly costing the social media giant more than it is delivering. The Facebook parent company‚Äôs second-quarter earnings are around the corner, and the numbers are not exactly throwing a party. While Wall Street expects profit to rise by about 11.5% to $15 billion, it is still disappointing , as that is the slowest growth the company has seen in two years. And even with revenue going up (14.7% to roughly $44.8 billion), that is also still Meta‚Äôs weakest pace since early 2023. Will Meta benefit from the hiring sprees and smart glasses dreams? Meanwhile, expenses keep climbing. Nearly a 9% jump in operating costs has investors watching closely, wondering if Zuckerberg‚Äôs obsession with ‚Äúsuperintelligence‚Äù is brilliance or bloat. Recently, Meta dropped $14.3 billion into Scale AI in June, luring in its genius CEO, Alexandr Wang, along with a few other hires. That move sparked the launch of Meta‚Äôs new ‚ÄúSuperintelligence Lab,‚Äù which sounds big on its own. Wang is now Meta‚Äôs chief AI officer, working with ex-GitHub boss Nat Friedman and serial founder Daniel Gross. Meta also tried, unsuccessfully, to buy Safe Superintelligence, a startup co-founded by OpenAI co-founder Ilya Sutskever. While Meta did not get him, the company took a bunch of top-tier researchers from OpenAI, Apple, and Google. Shengjia Zhao, who co-created ChatGPT, is now leading Meta‚Äôs AI lab as chief scientist; that‚Äôs not a small catch. Zuckerberg is betting that if he builds the biggest, baddest AI team and gives them crazy amounts of compute power, they will crack the code to leapfrog the competition. He even said Meta Superintelligence Labs will have ‚Äúby far the greatest compute per researcher,‚Äù which sounds impressive. However, the market is wondering what this actually means for product and profit. Analysts at Bank of America have indicated Zuckerberg‚Äôs comments are a sign of confidence, and while capex would increase, this also signals Meta as a ‚Äúplace of innovation.‚Äù The analysts wrote: ‚ÄúWe expect AI investment to be a top focus area on the upcoming earnings call, and Meta likely needs to make a case for strong AI returns to drive multiple expansion.‚Äù Meta‚Äôs Llama 4 missed the mark Despite the efforts and huge investments into AI, Meta seems to have missed it with some products. Earlier this year, Meta tried to mimic Chinese startup DeepSeek‚Äôs new AI model and ended up stumbling. The result of that initiative ‚Äì Llama 4 , its new open-source model, landed with a dull thud. Developers preferred the older Llama 3 because it was easier to work with. They have argued that the newer version was too rigid and too complicated. The fallout was enough to trigger a full-on internal shake-up. Some at Meta even wanted to ditch the promised ‚ÄúBehemoth‚Äù version of Llama 4 altogether in favour of a closed-source, tightly-guarded model. That would be a pretty stark U-turn from Meta‚Äôs open-source AI stance, though the company insists that position has not changed, at least not officially. Behind the scenes, frustrations have been bubbling. Some engineers pushed to stick with the older dense AI model approach. Others pushed for the newer ‚Äúmixture-of-experts‚Äù (MoE) style, more efficient, more flashy, more like what DeepSeek and OpenAI are doing. In the end, Meta went with MoE, but the release flopped. However, it has not been all doom and gloom for the company. To be fair, Meta‚Äôs core ad business is still alive and kicking. That has helped soften investor nerves while Zuckerberg spends like a tech CEO in a sci-fi movie. While analysts at Bank of America said his massive infrastructure investments are s sign of confidence about long-term revenue, confidence, however, does not pay dividends yet. Some folks are getting flashbacks to the self-driving car frenzy of 2017, when tech giants handed out absurd salaries just to keep AI talent in-house. ‚ÄúWinner takes all‚Äù feels like the mood again. The only difference this time is that everyone is playing ‚Äì OpenAI, Google, Anthropic‚Äîand now Meta is sprinting to catch up. Zuckerberg‚Äôs latest strategy shift shows he is willing to throw everything at the AI wall and see what sticks. Cryptopolitan Academy: Tired of market swings? title: Mizuho analyst explains why stablecoins aren‚Äôt disruptive threat to Visa and Mastercard
body: Mizuho‚Äôs senior analyst Dan Dolev disagrees with the popular narrative that stablecoins pose a disruptive threat to legacy payment giants like Visa Inc (NYSE: V) and Mastercard Inc (NYSE: MA). In an interview with CNBC last week, Dolev agreed that the crypto ecosystem continues to attract attention from investors and technologists alike, but said the disruption thesis ‚Äì particularly related to consumer payments ‚Äì is fundamentally flawed. ‚ÄúGraveyards are full of people who shorted Mastercard and Visa on such ideas,‚Äù he warned, adding, ‚Äúthey‚Äôve been proven wrong again and again.‚Äù Despite the hype surrounding blockchain and stablecoin adoption, especially after President Trump signed the ‚Äú GENIUS Act ‚Äù into law on July 18 th , Dolev believes the core value proposition of credit networks remains intact, particularly in areas where consumers get tangible benefits like rewards. Stablecoins are disruptive, but not for Visa and Mastercard Dolev does believe in the disruptive potential of stablecoins ‚Äì but only in narrow segments of the payments landscape. Specifically, he sees impact in remittances and B2B cross-border transactions, where traditional players charge high fees and offer limited innovation. However, speaking with CNBC , he drew clear line between these niches and the broader consumer payments ecosystem. Stablecoins are disruptive to certain pockets in payments, but nothing that touches consumer. According to the Mizuho analyst, Visa Inc. and Mastercard aren‚Äôt servicing those areas directly, meaning their core business remains insulated from stablecoin competition. Visa, Mastercard value proposition still wins Dolev remains unconvinced that stablecoins will replace traditional payment networks primarily because of the value proposition tied to credit cards. Credit cards are about way more than convenience ‚Äì they offer rewards, build credit, and enable access to services that stablecoins don‚Äôt replicate, he argued. Even when comparing stablecoin yields to credit card points, the Mizuho analyst noted that yields are rate-dependent. If interest rates fall, the incentive to use stablecoins diminishes, making it harder to monetize the business. Stablecoins: crypto hype vs. market reality On ‚ÄúPower Lunch‚Äù, Dolev also cautioned against overestimating the scale and momentum of the stablecoin market. While companies like Circle and platforms like Coinbase have generated excitement, he quoted stagnant market cap growth as evidence of a disconnect between narrative and reality. ‚ÄúThe USDC market cap literally hasn‚Äôt moved since April ‚Äì there‚Äôs a massive bifurcation between the story and the reality‚Äù he told CNBC. All in all, Dan Dolev remains somewhat skeptical of stablecoins‚Äô long-term profitability, especially if rates decline. Should you buy Visa or Mastercard stock? Dolev‚Äôs explanation on ‚ÄúPower Lunch‚Äù suggests the recent, stablecoins-driven pullback in Visa and Mastercard stock may be an opportunity to buy quality names at deep discounts. That‚Äôs why Wall Street continues to rate both fintech stocks at ‚Äúoverweight‚Äù for the back half of 2025. Plus, both V and MA shares currently pay a dividend yield of more than 0.50%, which makes up for another great reason to own them for the long-term. The post Mizuho analyst explains why stablecoins aren't disruptive threat to Visa and Mastercard appeared first on Invezz

title: What Maximum Gains Will Ethereum & Solana Deliver This Run? Are Today's Prices Too Late Or Strategic Entry For SOL & ETH?
body: With the crypto market showing signs of movement, investors are buzzing about Ethereum and Solana . Can these digital assets reach new heights in this run? Savvy traders ponder whether today's prices offer a golden chance or if they are too late to the party. Discover which tokens might be poised for impressive growth. Ethereum: Price Spurts and Key Levels Define Current Landscape Ethereum recorded a 55.11% increase over the past month and a 21.29% gain over the last six months. Price data reflects an uptrend in short-term performance paired with steady medium-term growth. The coin‚Äôs surge demonstrates strong investor confidence, with the market reacting positively to favorable technical cues and robust momentum indicators. Price fluctuations during these periods highlight growing interest and participation among traders, indicating that Ethereum has embarked on a notable rally. Momentum and volatility indicators support this growth, while overall market movements contribute to a significant price lift, setting the stage for further advances. At present, Ethereum‚Äôs price is trading in a defined range between a strong support at $1735.29 and notable resistance at $3254.36. The active price range of $2110.94 to $2870.47 positions the coin in a higher-value zone, reflecting recent gains. Bulls dominate the market as the one-month surge and sustained six-month boost energize sentiment. The RSI reading of 74.04 suggests an overbought condition, indicating a potential for a pullback. However, the momentum indicator at 184.55 and the Awesome Oscillator at 703.91 confirm strong short-term movement. Trading strategies could include watching for a breakout above $3254.36 or seeking entry near the support level of $1735.29 during corrections. Attention to volume and sentiment remains crucial for managing risk effectively. Uptrend Momentum Amid Mixed Recent Performance Solana shows a notable 21.772% gain over the last month paired with a 6-month decline of 19.564%. Price fluctuations during this period illustrate a coin experiencing both lively upward moves and pullbacks. The monthly rise indicates renewed buying interest despite longer-term softness over six months. Traders remain alert to shifts in momentum as volatility reshapes the coin‚Äôs landscape. The current price situation for Solana is defined by a trading range from $131 to $173.35. Nearest resistance is at $191.79 while nearby support rests at $107.89. A secondary resistance has formed at $233.74 with a second support at $65.94. Indicators suggest a slight bullish tilt with an RSI of 57.352 and a positive Awesome Oscillator of 19.579, although the weekly price change is -6.245%. These levels encourage trades within the defined ranges, with bulls attempting to push prices above resistance while bears defend support. No clear long-term trend has been established, prompting cautious trading focused on short-term swings. Conclusion Ethereum and Solana show strong potential for significant gains. ETH benefits from widespread adoption and a robust infrastructure. SOL, with its unique features, attracts developers and users alike. Current prices might still offer strategic entry points. Both cryptocurrencies have the potential for impressive returns in this market cycle. Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. title: Billionaire Joseph Lubin Says Ethereum Treasury Companies Can Be ‚ÄòMore Powerful‚Äô Than Bitcoin Treasuries ‚Äì Here‚Äôs Why
body: Co-founder of Ethereum and chairman of SharpLink Joseph Lubin says that accumulating ETH in treasuries could potentially be more valuable than companies doing the same thing with Bitcoin ( BTC ). In a new interview with Bloomberg, the chairman of the ETH Treasury firm says that SharpLink is mimicking some of the accumulation practices of Michael Saylor‚Äôs Strategy. ‚ÄúWell, Michael Saylor‚Äôs done a brilliant job with his particular implementation of the strategy. Being able to do some of the same things ‚Äì and many other things ‚Äì using Ether is actually much more powerful, because Ether is a productive and yielding asset. So, we‚Äôve been accumulating capital in various ways every single day. We‚Äôve been instantly turning it into Ether and instantly staking it ‚Äì or restaking it while taking advantage of decentralized finance yielding capabilities. This allows us to take our Ether and grow it directly. We believe we‚Äôll be able to accumulate more Ether per fully diluted share much faster than any other Ethereum-based project‚Äîor certainly faster than the Bitcoin-based projects.‚Äù Beyond that, Lubin says that SharpLink is continuing to accumulate ETH almost daily with the available capital it produces. ‚ÄúWell, we‚Äôre doing our best to accumulate capital every single day through ATM facilities, as well as using other mechanisms for earning yield every day on our existing Ether. And nearly every day, we‚Äôre buying more Ether and staking it immediately.‚Äù Follow us on X , Facebook and Telegram Don't Miss a Beat ‚Äì Subscribe to get email alerts delivered directly to your inbox Check Price Action Surf The Daily Hodl Mix Disclaimer: Opinions expressed at The Daily Hodl are not investment advice. title: XRP price prediction 2025-2031: Will XRP reach $5?
body: Key takeaways: The XRP price prediction suggests that the coin‚Äôs price will rise to $4.06 by the end of 2025. The growing adoption rate of the XRP Ledger Protocol could push XRP to $10.15, with a possible maximum trading value of $10.83 in 2028. In 2031, the target price for XRP is between $16.24 and $17.59, with an average price of $16.92. XRP has a strong community of supporters and developers and continues to see tremendous potential in Ripple‚Äôs technology and products. Despite short-term price fluctuations and a bear market, many analysts believe XRP has a bright future. Whether it will reach new highs or continue to grow steadily remains to be seen, but this crypto asset will undoubtedly play an important role in global financial institutions. So, how high can XRP realistically go? Will XRP reach 5 dollars? Let‚Äôs answer these questions in our XRP price prediction. Overview Cryptocurrency Ripple Token XRP Price $3.08 Market cap $182.52B Trading volume (24-hour) $6.38B Circulating supply 59.23B All-time high $3.84 on Jan 4, 2018 All-time low $0.002802 on Jul 7, 2014 24-hour high $3.18 24-hour low $3.08 XRP price prediction: Technical analysis Metric Value Price volatility 17.38% 50-day SMA $2.57 200-day SMA $1.86 Sentiment Bullish Fear and greed index 73 (Greed) Green days 20/30 (67%) XRP price analysis: XRP faces stiff resistance On July 29, XRP dropped by 1.55% in 24 hours, reflecting profit taking following a 42% rally in the last 30 days. The event was accompanied by a 35% drop in trading volumes to $6.77B, showing waning interest from traders. Coinbase moved 40% of XRP reserves from cold storage, sparking operational concerns despite no confirmed sell-off. XRP price analysis on the daily timeframe XRPUSD chart by TradingView XRP‚Äôs 14-day relative strength index crossed into overbought territory earlier this month, maintaining the stance for weeks, until recently, after facing resistance at $3.66. The William Alligator trendlines show that XRP‚Äôs volatility rose over the same period. Notably, the MACD histograms now show negative momentum. The 1-day technical breakdown below $3.24 trendline and the 10-day SMA shifted momentum bearish. XRP price analysis on the 4-hour chart XRPUSD chart by TradingView Zoomed in, the 4-hour chart shows XRP is breaking out downwards. The red candles are suggestive of a bear market. The MACD histograms, however, indicate little market momentum, suggesting that it could move sideways over the short term. XRP technical indicators: Levels and action Daily simple moving average (SMA) Period Value ($) Action SMA 3 2.82 BUY SMA 5 3.00 BUY SMA 10 3.21 SELL SMA 21 3.08 BUY SMA 50 2.57 BUY SMA 100 2.41 BUY SMA 200 1.86 BUY Daily exponential moving average (EMA) Period Value ($) Action EMA 3 2.91 BUY EMA 5 2.72 BUY EMA 10 2.50 BUY EMA 21 2.35 BUY EMA 50 2.34 BUY EMA 100 2.30 BUY EMA 200 2.00 BUY What to expect from XRP price analysis next? Ripple price analysis shows a bullish coin that is defining a top after breaking its previous all-time high last week. The wider altcoin market remains bearish as more capital flows into Bitcoin. The analysis shows that traders chose to close profits in the last 24 hours as its price dropped. Looking ahead, a break above $3.66 will be critical in determining whether XRP will remain bullish. Is XRP a good investment? XRP, a cryptocurrency specifically designed for quick and cost-effective cross-border transactions, holds promise in global finance. The easing of regulatory hurdles for Ripple and the rising adoption might boost the XRP price. Additionally, several recent acquisitions and CBDC development make XRP a good investment option in the long term. As with any investment, the outlook for XRP remains uncertain, necessitating a cautious approach and thorough due diligence. It is advised to proceed with caution Why is XRP up? The XRP/USD crypto pair price has increased as buying momentum took hold, bringing the price up to $3.20 during the day. The RSI increased to 62.71 at the same time and is in neutral territory. How much will XRP cost in 2025? XRP is expected to trade at an average price of $3.38 by the end of 2025. Will XRP reach $5? For XRP to reach $5, its value would need to double. Considering the current bullish trend and XRP‚Äôs price action, a surge to $5 by the middle of next year is not entirely out of the question, particularly if demand for XRP tokens continues to rise and its growth trajectory remains consistent. However, it‚Äôs crucial to remember that XRP‚Äôs all-time high stands at $3.84, achieved on January 7, 2018. Can XRP reach $20? According to Ripple‚Äôs price prediction, XRP has a lesser chance of reaching $20 by 2031. However, it is expected to reach this level if the XRP ecosystem adoption by major financial institutions continues, making it a good option to buy XRP. Will XRP reach $100 dollars? Though there are rumors of XRP reaching $100 in the market, and some pro-XRP analysts are also promoting it, many are raising questions about this possibility. XRP may not reach $100 in the near future, at least. Will XRP reach $1000? If one XRP coin is worth $1000, its market cap must be more than $100 trillion. Comparatively, the total global stock market cap is about $110 trillion. Therefore, it is unlikely that XRP will reach $1000, based on current market dynamics. Does XRP have a good long-term future? XRP is expected to increase in value gradually over the coming years, giving good yields to XRP holders and institutional investors. The coin is trading at five times its value from last year, and it is expected to reach the highest price of $17.59 by 2031. This makes it a valuable asset for multiple gains after significant market capitalization with continuous efforts by Ripple Labs. However, regulatory uncertainties still linger with the Ripple lawsuit. Considering these factors, investors must carry out their own research. Recent news/opinions on the Ripple Network Dune Analytics data shows that almost 60% of transactions on XRPL are payments. Weekly payments on the network increased by more than 430% in less than two years. Dune Analytics also indicates that weekly payment transactions on the network moved from around 1.5 million in 2023 to over 8 million in 2025. Read more about it here . Lawyer Fred Rispoli states that the SEC and Ripple could settle how XRP sales to institutions will be conducted in a way the SEC finds acceptable. Meanwhile, Ripple plans to further integrate XRP into institutional finance by acquiring Hidden Road for $1.25 billion. Read more about it here . XRP price prediction July 2025 According to XRP price prediction, in July 2025, XRP could reach a maximum price of $2.70. The average trading price is expected to be $3.38 for the month, while the lowest it can go, as per XRP cost estimation, is $1.72, considering the current XRP sentiment. We expect an average trading price of $3.28 and a floor price of $1.50. Period Potential Low ($) Average Price ($) Potential High ($) XRP price prediction 2025 $1.50 $3.28 $4.06 XRP price predictions 2026-2031 Year Minimum Average Maximum 2026 $4.96 $5.64 $6.32 2027 $7.22 $7.90 $8.57 2028 $9.47 $10.15 $10.83 2029 $11.73 $12.41 $13.08 2030 $13.99 $14.66 $15.34 2031 $16.24 $16.92 $17.59 XRP price prediction 2026 The XRP price predictions for 2026 suggest that the XRP cryptocurrency could reach a minimum trading price of $4.96 and an average price of $5.64. The XRP price forecast further suggests that the Ripple coin is estimated to reach a maximum of $6.32. XRP price prediction 2027 Ripple XRP price prediction for 2027 estimates a minimum value of $7.22, which is quite a bit higher than the current XRP price, and an estimated average XRP price of $7.90. The maximum price forecast for 2027 is $8.57. Ripple price prediction 2028 The Ripple price prediction for 2028 shows a minimum price of $9.47. The XRP price can reach a maximum level of $10.83; the estimated average trading value will be $10.15 through 2028. XRP price prediction 2029 The XRP price prediction for 2029 estimates that XRP will attain a minimum price of $11.73, an average trading price of $14.66, and a maximum price of $15.34. XRP price prediction 2030 XRP price prediction for 2030 suggests a minimum price of $13.99 and an average expected trading price of $14.22 throughout the year 2030. The maximum forecasted Ripple price for 2030 is set at $14.88. XRP price prediction 2031 The XRP price prediction for 2031 is a minimum price of $16.24 and an average price of $16.92. The maximum forecast price for 2025 is $17.59, as crypto analysts expect investors to continue buying XRP as crypto assets. XRP price prediction 2025 ‚Äì 2031 XRP market price prediction: Analysts‚Äô XRP price forecast Firm Name 2025 2026 DigitalCoinPrice $4.93 $5.77 Coincodex $3.27 $3.56 Cryptopolitan‚Äôs XRP price prediction Our forecast shows that XRP will achieve a high price of $4.06 near the end of 2025. In 2026, the XRP price will range between $4.81 and $6.13. In 2031, the cryptocurrency will range between $4.96 and $6.32, with an average price of $5.64. It is important to consider that predictions are not investment advice. Professional consultation is suggested, or you can carry out your research. XRP historic price sentiment XRP price history: Coinmarketcap Before 2017, the asset‚Äôs value hovered around $0.01; in April 2017, it rose to $0.05; the gradual climb soon continued as it reached $0.25 in May, showing a positive price action as Ripple continued to excel. Towards the end of 2019, XRP price stabilized at around $0.30 and did not cross the $0.5 mark throughout the year. However, the bullish run of 2020 pushed the coin‚Äôs value to a peak price of $0.8, gaining investor interest before finishing the year at $0.66. Early 2021 was supposed to be bullish for XRP, but the SEC announced a lawsuit that derailed investors. Nonetheless, XRP beat the odds and surged above $1.5 during the year, but by 2022, it plummeted significantly to as low as $0.31. XRP started 2023 at $0.335, and on July 13, it almost doubled its value in a steep spike. It shot from $0.470 to $0.814 while swinging towards $0.9 for a few hours. A partial victory against the SEC triggered the price jump, surging the trading volume. XRP closed 2023 at about $0.62. In 2024, XRP has so far ridden the market wave. The bears earlier on and then a bullish price movement by mid-March resulted in a market price of $0.72, according to data from the cryptocurrency market. In July, XRP traded between $0.418 and $0.658, showing a good recovery. However, the coin went under bearish pressure at the start of August, falling back down to the $0.550 range as per crypto market records showing high volatility. In September 2024, XRP recovered up to the $0.642 level, but the price went down to the $0.500 range in October. A tremendous bullish impulse was observed in November when XRP touched the $1.96 mark, and it reached $2.72 on December 2, 2024. In January 2025, XRP reached a peak price of $3.19 and traded near the $2.90 level in February. It stepped down to $2.1 in March and to $1.79 in April. By the middle of May, XRP touched $2.57; however, near the start of July, it is trending around the $2.26 range, as the market sentiment tilts towards the positive side.

title: JPMorgan Chase Says ‚ÄòSignificant Leap Forward‚Äô Underway for Tokenized Money Market Funds Amid Goldman and BNY Partnership: Report
body: Analysts at the financial giant JPMorgan Chase think Goldman Sachs‚Äô new partnership with BNY is a ‚Äúsignificant leap forward‚Äù for tokenized money market funds, according to a new Bloomberg report. Goldman and BNY recently announced a joint venture to launch tokenized money market fund services using a blockchain developed by Goldman. BlackRock, BNY Investments Dreyfus, Federated Hermes, Fidelity Investments and Goldman Sachs Asset Management all plan to participate in the launch of the new service. Teresa Ho, a managing director at JPMorgan, tells Bloomberg the partnership could expand the use cases for money market funds. ‚ÄúThe true takeaway from this is beyond the typical way we see money funds being used as a cash management asset class ‚Äî they can now use it as collateral. Instead of posting cash, or posting Treasuries, you can post money-market shares and not lose interest along the way. It speaks to the versatility of money funds.‚Äù Ho also notes that numerous other financial firms see the potential benefit of tokenization amid blossoming regulatory clarity. ‚ÄúThis is true across banks, asset managers, and payment processors. We wouldn‚Äôt be surprised to continue to see more developments with respect to stablecoins being more integrated with the traditional financial system, as well as more tokenization of real-world assets.‚Äù Follow us on X , Facebook and Telegram Don't Miss a Beat ‚Äì Subscribe to get email alerts delivered directly to your inbox Check Price Action Surf The Daily Hodl Mix Disclaimer: Opinions expressed at The Daily Hodl are not investment advice. title: XRP Dormant Coins On The Move: Reason Behind Price Plunge?
body: On-chain data shows old XRP tokens have been moving back into circulation recently, a potential sign that long-term holders have been taking profits. XRP Mean Dollar Invested Age Has Seen A Drop Recently According to data from the on-chain analytics firm Santiment, the XRP network has seen signs of movement from veteran hands. Two key metrics highlight this trend: Mean Dollar Invested Age and Age Consumed. The first of these, the Mean Dollar Invested Age, keeps track of the average age (in days) of every dollar invested into the cryptocurrency. The ‚Äòage‚Äô of a coin or the USD value invested in it is tracked from the point of the coin‚Äôs last transaction. Related Reading: Ethereum Exchange Reserve Plummets: Over 1 Million ETH Withdrawn For example, if a coin remains dormant for 10 days, it accumulates 10 coin days. If the price at the time of its last movement was $2, then it‚Äôs carrying 20 coin-dollar days. The Mean Dollar Invested Age per dollar in this case is, therefore, 10 coin-dollar days. Now, what happens when a coin that has been dormant for some period is finally moved? Both the coin days and coin-dollar days associated to it reset back to zero. In other words, its age is ‚Äòconsumed.‚Äô The second indicator of relevance here, the Age Consumed, keeps track of the coin days being destroyed in this manner across the network every day. Below is a chart that shows how the Mean Dollar Invested Age and Age Consumed have changed for XRP over the past year. As is visible in the graph, the XRP Mean Dollar Invested Age has witnessed a decline during the last few weeks, indicating that the average dollar invested into the asset is becoming younger. The indicator‚Äôs value has now come down to 593 days, which is 91 days lower compared to one month ago. The Age Consumed has seen some notable spikes alongside this decline, which means that long-term holders have been making moves. The long-term holders refer to the HODLers of the market, who hold for long periods with strong conviction and, in the process, amass a large number of coin days. When these diamond hands finally make moves, the Age Consumed tends to register spikes as large-scale coin days destruction accompanies them. From the chart, it‚Äôs apparent that most of the recent large spikes came just as XRP hit its price top. This could be a potential sign that the long-term holders were cashing in on the rally. Related Reading: Bitcoin Remains Flat‚ÄîAnd The SSR Ratio Might Explain Why Since then, the cryptocurrency has plunged. It now remains to be seen whether the Age Consumed would continue to spike in the near future or if the HODLers are done for now. XRP Price At the time of writing, XRP is trading around $3.15, down more than 10% in the last week. Featured image from Dall-E, Santiment.net, chart from TradingView.com

title: Pundit to XRP Holders: The Next 48 Hours Are Not Normal
body: Bo Hines, Executive Director of the Presidential Working Group on Digital Asset Markets, announced that the group has completed its 180-day report, which will be made public on July 30, 2025 . Reacting to this development, X Finance Bull issued a strong warning to the XRP community on X, stating: ‚ÄúThe next 48 hours are not normal.‚Äù He claimed that the upcoming report could confirm XRP‚Äôs involvement in U.S. strategic reserves, not as a threat, but as a tool. ‚ÄúYou‚Äôll look back at this moment and wish you loaded more $XRP,‚Äù he added. $XRP holders, the next 48 hours are not normal The U.S. is about to drop a crypto report that could confirm strategic reserves and XRP is front and center. Not to stop it. To use it. You‚Äôll look back at this moment and wish you loaded more $XRP pic.twitter.com/ltIzfhvOve ‚Äî X Finance Bull (@Xfinancebull) July 29, 2025 The Presidential Working Group The working group was formed under Executive Order 14178, signed by President Trump on January 23, 2025. The mandate was to develop a clear framework for digital assets in the U.S., including token classification, investor protections, stablecoin rules, and digital asset infrastructure. The group was also directed to explore the establishment of government-held reserves using seized cryptocurrency assets. The 180-day deadline concludes with the expected release of the final report on July 30. Strategic Reserves and XRP‚Äôs Possible Role On March 6, the administration issued another executive order establishing a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve, along with a broader U.S. Digital Asset Stockpile. The initiative uses assets seized from criminal enforcement actions, and includes leading cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Cardano (ADA), and XRP. This development sparked widespread speculation about the government‚Äôs long-term crypto strategy. Significantly, XRP was one of the few tokens explicitly named in the documents outlining the reserve program, adding weight to X Finance Bull‚Äôs assertions. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Regulatory Clarity and Legislative Progress The release of the report also comes shortly after the signing of the GENIUS Act on July 18 , 2025, a landmark law that regulates stablecoins, mandates audits, and strengthens federal oversight. These legislative efforts reflect a broader shift in the U.S. government‚Äôs approach to digital assets: from fragmented and enforcement-driven to structured and proactive. The upcoming report is expected to align with these recent laws and clarify how strategic reserves, especially those containing XRP, will be managed going forward. Why the XRP Community Is Watching Closely X Finance Bull‚Äôs warning reflects the growing anticipation that XRP might not only be acknowledged but actively positioned as a national strategic asset. Earlier this year, XRP saw a 32% surge after it was confirmed as part of the U.S. reserve program. A formal policy endorsement in the July 30 report could trigger another wave of bullish sentiment. With the report‚Äôs release imminent, the next 48 hours mark a potential turning point for XRP. While nothing is guaranteed until the document is made public, X Finance Bull‚Äôs message underscores the magnitude of what‚Äôs at stake. If XRP is indeed confirmed as a cornerstone of U.S. digital asset strategy, its value, both in the market and in policy, could rise significantly. title: IMF is now more optimistic about economic growth in 2025 and 2026
body: The International Monetary Fund (IMF) reviewed its ‚Äúworld economic outlook‚Äù upwards, revising the expected growth in 2025 to 3%, up from the 2.8% projection in April. Growth in 2026 was also revised to 3.1%, more optimistic than the previously predicted growth of 3%. IMF Chief Economist, Pierre-Olivier Gourinchas, downplayed the impact of Trump‚Äôs tariffs on international trade. He said the damage was almost negligible in polite language, calling it the world economy‚Äôs ‚Äútenuous resilience.‚Äù He pointed out that most levies were unlikely to cause the economic chaos previously forecasted. The U.S. economy is expected to grow by 1.9%, up from the April estimation of 1.8%. Next year‚Äôs estimates also increased from 1.7% to 2%. China is also expected to grow by 4.8%, 0.8 percentage points higher than anticipated in April. Gourinchas believes that the decline of the U.S. dollar and the RMB has played a significant role in this revised outlook. He added that diversified, strong export sales to Asia and other regions would improve the world‚Äôs economic outlook. Gourinchas asks Trump‚Äôs administration to steer clear of the Fed The IMF Chief Economist subtly asked Trump‚Äôs administration not to interfere with the Fed‚Äôs independence, claiming it could cause financial, macroeconomic, and monetary volatility. However, he pointed out that reducing tariffs from 24% to 17% on U.S. imports could ease tariff-related pressure. Gourinchas also said companies that had stocked and hoarded imports ahead of the implementation of tariffs played a critical role in boosting this year‚Äôs projected economic growth. However, Trump insists that cutting the Fed rates to 1% can improve the country‚Äôs economic growth. The angered U.S. president recently called the Fed Chair, Jerome Powell , a ‚Äúnumbskull.‚Äù Trump argued that the current high lending rates (4.25%-4.5%) increased the government‚Äôs refinancing cost by ‚Äúhundreds of billions of dollars.‚Äù ‚ÄúWithout comprehensive agreements, the ongoing trade uncertainty could increasingly weigh on investment and activity.‚Äù ‚Äì Pierre-Olivier Gourinchas , Chief Economist at the IMF Gourinchas also warned that an intensified attack on the Federal Reserve could ‚Äúworsen the situation.‚Äù He pointed out the importance of upholding the Fed‚Äôs independence, adding that central banks were essential for economic stability and anchoring inflation. The economist further highlighted the ‚Äúsoft landing‚Äù by the world‚Äôs central banks as one of the key reasons these institutions needed to remain credible. The pursuit of price stability required a great deal of independence. IMF breaks down global growth projections Projected economic growth across world economies. Source: FT The IMF estimated that developing and emerging economies would grow by 4.1% in 2025, an increase of 0.4 percentage points from April‚Äôs estimates. Advanced economies were expected to grow by 1.5%, up from the 1.4% estimation in April. Growth forecasts for Mexico, the U.S., Britain, China, Canada, Brazil, Nigeria, Japan, Saudi Arabia, and the Euro Area were upgraded. Gourinchas said this resilience was welcome, as the impact of trade shocks was less severe than previously feared. However, he mentioned that risks posed by the slow development of trade talks around Trump‚Äôs tariffs still caused uncertainty. The IMF also asserted that economic policy uncertainty remained high for 2025 and 2026. The IMF economist urged countries to reduce policy-related uncertainty and promote more transparent and clear international trade frameworks. He emphasized that ‚Äúpragmatic cooperation‚Äù was ‚Äúparamount,‚Äù especially since international trade rules were dysfunctional. Overall, Gourinchas believes that geopolitical tensions and fiscal vulnerabilities could also be ‚Äúprecarious‚Äù to the ‚Äúequilibrium‚Äù of stances in trade policy. title: Profit Taking Continues To Weigh On Cryptocurrencies
body: Summary Bitcoin and Ethereum are still consolidating around their relative peaks, underscoring the resilience of the market‚Äôs bellwethers. Ethereum's price action is currently consolidating in a triangle formation after hitting some new intermediate highs at $3,944. The selloff ongoing in Solana represents well the rest of the altcoins - a very strong run but also a strong reversal. By Elior Manier After the beginning of last week's big push in altcoins, cryptocurrencies are seeing some kind of retraction from their recent highs. Bitcoin ( BTC-USD ) and Ethereum ( ETH-USD ), however, are still consolidating around their relative peaks, underscoring the resilience of the market‚Äôs bellwethers. Profit-taking has rippled across smaller tokens, with mid‚Äëcap altcoins sliding 5‚Äì10 % as traders lock in gains after their consequent past week rallies. Bitcoin is whipsawing in a tight $115,000‚Äì$120,000 band, while Ethereum hovers just below the $3,800 mark, digesting its latest red-hot rally. Meanwhile, heavyweights like Cardano ( ADA-USD ) and Solana ( SOL-USD ) have given back their gains a bit more sharply, pressured by rotation into stablecoins and some sell-the-news on the US deals ahead of key economic events. Despite the pullback, liquidity remains robust, and open interest across futures markets holds near record levels. The challenge is now to see if sentiment from the broader market news influences the demand for cryptocurrencies more positively or negatively. In the meantime, let‚Äôs look at technicals for the three most popular cryptos : ETH, BTC and SOL. This article is a follow-up on the cryptocurrency article released Friday. Bitcoin, Ethereum and Solana 4H Charts Bitcoin 4H Chart Bitcoin 4H Chart, July 29, 2025 ‚Äì Source: TradingView Bitcoin is still consolidating in a triangle formation, but its 4H 50-period MA has just passed above the price action and is now becoming resistance. The weekly open wasn't as strong compared to the Ethereum, showing that despite consolidating at its highs, Bitcoin is trading on a less intense relative strength to the Ether than it was in the beginning of 2025. RSI momentum is also turning slightly bearish on short-timeframes, but do not forget that the Bitcoin is trading very near its all-time highs. Track the reactions between $110,000 to $115,000 ‚Äì A weekly close below that region would be giving more hand to the bears. Keep ETH/BTC in check to get a better view of the appetite for altcoins Support Levels: $115,000 Pivot Zone (+/- $600) Previous ATH Support $110,000 to $112,000 $100,000 Major Support Resistance Levels: 4H MA 50 at $118,269 $120,000 Resistance (+/- $300) Current ATH resistance $121,000 to $123,000 Potential Resistance between $126,500 and $128,200 (Fib Extensions) Ethereum 4H Chart ETH 4H Chart, July 29, 2025 ‚Äì Source: TradingView Ethereum's price action is currently consolidating in a triangle formation after hitting some new intermediate highs at $3,944. The action is still slightly tilted upwards, and staying above the immediate pivot zone, which would be more bullish than bearish. However, a general look at the market would be needed to confirm this hypothesis: Altcoins are currently getting sold off. Markets are linked, so any rally in the Ether here should pull upwards sentiment. Look at the 4H 50-period MA which just caught up to the price action for immediate relative strength indications. Keep in check any breakout to the upside or downside from here to get a more general view from the market. Support Levels: Immediate Pivot Between $3,700 to $3,750 4H MA 50 $3,700 $3,500 support zone Resistance Levels: $3,880 to $3,940 resistance zone $3,944 intermediate highs $4,090 December 2024 highs $4,870 all-time highs Solana 4H Chart SOL 4H Chart, July 29, 2025 ‚Äì Source: TradingView The selloff ongoing in Solana represents well the rest of the altcoins‚Äîa very strong run but also a strong reversal. The bulls will have to be careful of how they play it to maintain the bullish structure. The 4H RSI is now in bear territory but isn't sloping downwards, usually a sign of lack of seller strength and a sign of consolidation. Watch the $175 intermediate lows from the end of last week to spot imminent momentum. Staying above holds the intermediate bullish outlook, while passing below will give some hands to the bears. Support Levels: $175 intermediate lows $150 previous pivot turned support Support 2 $140 to $145 Resistance Levels: $200 to $205 $185 Momentum Pivot and 4H MA 50 Resistance 2: 225 to 232 Resistance 3: 255 to 265 All-time Highs: $295 Safe Trades! Original Post Editor's Note: The summary bullets for this article were chosen by Seeking Alpha editors.
